35.transliteration: Innal laaha yumsikus samaawaati wal arda an tazoolaaa; wa la'in zaalataaa in amsa kahumaa min ahadim mim ba'dih; innahoo kaana Haleeman Ghafooraa

35.text: وَأَقْسَمُوا بِاللَّهِ جَهْدَ أَيْمَانِهِمْ لَئِنْ جَاءَهُمْ نَذِيرٌ لَيَكُونُنَّ أَهْدَىٰ مِنْ إِحْدَى الْأُمَمِ ۖ فَلَمَّا جَاءَهُمْ نَذِيرٌ مَا زَادَهُمْ إِلَّا نُفُورًا
35.translation: And they swore by Allah their strongest oaths that if a warner came to them, they would be more guided than [any] one of the [previous] nations. But when a warner came to them, it did not increase them except in aversion.
35.transliteration: Wa aqsamoo billaahi jahda aymaanihim la'in jaaa'ahum nazeerul layakoonunna ahdaa min ihdal umami falam maa jaaa'ahum nazeerum maa zaadahum illaa nufooraa

35.text: اسْتِكْبَارًا فِي الْأَرْضِ وَمَكْرَ السَّيِّئِ ۚ وَلَا يَحِيقُ الْمَكْرُ السَّيِّئُ إِلَّا بِأَهْلِهِ ۚ فَهَلْ يَنْظُرُونَ إِلَّا سُنَّتَ الْأَوَّلِينَ ۚ فَلَنْ تَجِدَ لِسُنَّتِ اللَّهِ تَبْدِيلًا ۖ وَلَنْ تَجِدَ لِسُنَّتِ اللَّهِ تَحْوِيلًا
35.translation: [Due to] arrogance in the land and plotting of evil; but the evil plot does not encompass except its own people. Then do they await except the way of the former peoples? But you will never find in the way of Allah any change, and you will never find in the way of Allah any alteration.
35.transliteration: Istakbaaran fil ardi wa makras sayyi'; wa laa yaheequl makrus sayyi'u illaa bi ahlih; fahal yanzuroona illaa sunnatal awwaleen; falan tajida lisunnatil laahi tabdeelanw wa lan tajida lisunnatil laahi tahweela

35.text: أَوَلَمْ يَسِيرُوا فِي الْأَرْضِ فَيَنْظُرُوا كَيْفَ كَانَ عَاقِبَةُ الَّذِينَ مِنْ قَبْلِهِمْ وَكَانُوا أَشَدَّ مِنْهُمْ قُوَّةً ۚ وَمَا كَانَ اللَّهُ لِيُعْجِزَهُ مِنْ شَيْءٍ فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ وَلَا فِي الْأَرْضِ ۚ إِنَّهُ كَانَ عَلِيمًا قَدِيرًا
35.translation: Have they not traveled through the land and observed how was the end of those before them? And they were greater than them in power. But Allah is not to be caused failure by anything in the heavens or on the earth. Indeed, He is ever Knowing and Competent.
35.transliteration: Awalam yaseeroo fil ardi fa yanzuroo kaifa kaana 'aaqibatul lazeena min qblihim wa kaanoo ashadda minhum quwwah; wa maa kaanal laahu liyu'jizahoo min shai'in fis samaawaati wa laa fil ard; innahoo kaana 'Aleeman Qadeeraa

35.text: وَلَوْ يُؤَاخِذُ اللَّهُ النَّاسَ بِمَا كَسَبُوا مَا تَرَكَ عَلَىٰ ظَهْرِهَا مِنْ دَابَّةٍ وَلَٰكِنْ يُؤَخِّرُهُمْ إِلَىٰ أَجَلٍ مُسَمًّى ۖ فَإِذَا جَاءَ أَجَلُهُمْ فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ كَانَ بِعِبَادِهِ بَصِيرًا
35.translation: And if Allah were to impose blame on the people for what they have earned, He would not leave upon the earth any creature. But He defers them for a specified term. And when their time comes, then indeed Allah has ever been, of His servants, Seeing.
35.transliteration: Wa law yu'aakhizul laahun naasa bima kasaboo maa taraka 'alaa zahrihaa min daaabbatinw wa laakiny yu'akhkhiruhum ilaaa ajalim musamman fa izaa jaaa'a ajaluhum fa innal laaha kaana bi'ibaadihee Baseeraa

36.text: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ يس
36.translation: Ya, Seen.
36.transliteration: Yaa-Seeen

36.text: وَالْقُرْآنِ الْحَكِيمِ
36.translation: By the wise Qur'an.
36.transliteration: Wal-Qur-aanil-Hakeem

36.text: إِنَّكَ لَمِنَ الْمُرْسَلِينَ
36.translation: Indeed you, [O Muhammad], are from among the messengers,
36.transliteration: Innaka laminal mursaleen

36.text: عَلَىٰ صِرَاطٍ مُسْتَقِيمٍ
36.translation: On a straight path.
36.transliteration: 'Alaa Siraatim Mustaqeem

36.text: تَنْزِيلَ الْعَزِيزِ الرَّحِيمِ
36.translation: [This is] a revelation of the Exalted in Might, the Merciful,
36.transliteration: Tanzeelal 'Azeezir Raheem

36.text: لِتُنْذِرَ قَوْمًا مَا أُنْذِرَ آبَاؤُهُمْ فَهُمْ غَافِلُونَ
36.translation: That you may warn a people whose forefathers were not warned, so they are unaware.
36.transliteration: Litunzira qawmam maaa unzira aabaaa'uhum fahum ghaafiloon

36.text: لَقَدْ حَقَّ الْقَوْلُ عَلَىٰ أَكْثَرِهِمْ فَهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
36.translation: Already the word has come into effect upon most of them, so they do not believe.
36.transliteration: Laqad haqqal qawlu 'alaaa aksarihim fahum laa yu'minoon

36.text: إِنَّا جَعَلْنَا فِي أَعْنَاقِهِمْ أَغْلَالًا فَهِيَ إِلَى الْأَذْقَانِ فَهُمْ مُقْمَحُونَ
36.translation: Indeed, We have put shackles on their necks, and they are to their chins, so they are with heads [kept] aloft.
36.transliteration: Innaa ja'alnaa feee a'naaqihim aghlaalan fahiya ilal azqaani fahum muqmahoon

36.text: وَجَعَلْنَا مِنْ بَيْنِ أَيْدِيهِمْ سَدًّا وَمِنْ خَلْفِهِمْ سَدًّا فَأَغْشَيْنَاهُمْ فَهُمْ لَا يُبْصِرُونَ
36.translation: And We have put before them a barrier and behind them a barrier and covered them, so they do not see.
36.transliteration: Wa ja'alnaa mim baini aydeehim saddanw-wa min khalfihim saddan fa aghshai naahum fahum laa yubsiroon

36.text: وَسَوَاءٌ عَلَيْهِمْ أَأَنْذَرْتَهُمْ أَمْ لَمْ تُنْذِرْهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
36.translation: And it is all the same for them whether you warn them or do not warn them - they will not believe.
36.transliteration: Wa sawaaa'un 'alaihim 'a-anzartahum am lam tunzirhum laa yu'minoon

36.text: إِنَّمَا تُنْذِرُ مَنِ اتَّبَعَ الذِّكْرَ وَخَشِيَ الرَّحْمَٰنَ بِالْغَيْبِ ۖ فَبَشِّرْهُ بِمَغْفِرَةٍ وَأَجْرٍ كَرِيمٍ
36.translation: You can only warn one who follows the message and fears the Most Merciful unseen. So give him good tidings of forgiveness and noble reward.
36.transliteration: Innamaa tunziru manit taba 'az-Zikra wa khashiyar Rahmaana bilghaib, fabashshirhu bimaghfiratinw-wa ajrin kareem

36.text: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نُحْيِي الْمَوْتَىٰ وَنَكْتُبُ مَا قَدَّمُوا وَآثَارَهُمْ ۚ وَكُلَّ شَيْءٍ أَحْصَيْنَاهُ فِي إِمَامٍ مُبِينٍ
36.translation: Indeed, it is We who bring the dead to life and record what they have put forth and what they left behind, and all things We have enumerated in a clear register.
36.transliteration: Innaa Nahnu nuhyil mawtaa wa naktubu maa qaddamoo wa aasaarahum; wa kulla shai'in ahsainaahu feee Imaamim Mubeen

36.text: وَاضْرِبْ لَهُمْ مَثَلًا أَصْحَابَ الْقَرْيَةِ إِذْ جَاءَهَا الْمُرْسَلُونَ
36.translation: And present to them an example: the people of the city, when the messengers came to it -
36.transliteration: Wadrib lahum masalan Ashaabal Qaryatih; iz jaaa'ahal mursaloon

36.text: إِذْ أَرْسَلْنَا إِلَيْهِمُ اثْنَيْنِ فَكَذَّبُوهُمَا فَعَزَّزْنَا بِثَالِثٍ فَقَالُوا إِنَّا إِلَيْكُمْ مُرْسَلُونَ
36.translation: When We sent to them two but they denied them, so We strengthened them with a third, and they said, "Indeed, we are messengers to you."
36.transliteration: Iz arsalnaaa ilaihimusnaini fakazzaboohumaa fa'azzaznaa bisaalisin faqaalooo innaaa ilaikum mursaloon

36.text: قَالُوا مَا أَنْتُمْ إِلَّا بَشَرٌ مِثْلُنَا وَمَا أَنْزَلَ الرَّحْمَٰنُ مِنْ شَيْءٍ إِنْ أَنْتُمْ إِلَّا تَكْذِبُونَ
36.translation: They said, "You are not but human beings like us, and the Most Merciful has not revealed a thing. You are only telling lies."
36.transliteration: Qaaloo maaa antum illaa basharum mislunaa wa maaa anzalar Rahmaanu min shai'in in antum illaa takziboon

36.text: قَالُوا رَبُّنَا يَعْلَمُ إِنَّا إِلَيْكُمْ لَمُرْسَلُونَ
36.translation: They said, "Our Lord knows that we are messengers to you,
36.transliteration: Qaaloo Rabbunaa ya'lamu innaaa ilaikum lamursaloon

36.text: وَمَا عَلَيْنَا إِلَّا الْبَلَاغُ الْمُبِينُ
36.translation: And we are not responsible except for clear notification."
36.transliteration: Wa maa 'alainaaa illal balaaghul mubeen

36.text: قَالُوا إِنَّا تَطَيَّرْنَا بِكُمْ ۖ لَئِنْ لَمْ تَنْتَهُوا لَنَرْجُمَنَّكُمْ وَلَيَمَسَّنَّكُمْ مِنَّا عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ
36.translation: They said, "Indeed, we consider you a bad omen. If you do not desist, we will surely stone you, and there will surely touch you, from us, a painful punishment."
36.transliteration: Qaaloo innaa tataiyarnaa bikum la'il-lam tantahoo lanar jumannakum wa la-yamassan nakum minnaa 'azaabun aleem

36.text: قَالُوا طَائِرُكُمْ مَعَكُمْ ۚ أَئِنْ ذُكِّرْتُمْ ۚ بَلْ أَنْتُمْ قَوْمٌ مُسْرِفُونَ
36.translation: They said, "Your omen is with yourselves. Is it because you were reminded? Rather, you are a transgressing people."
36.transliteration: Qaaloo taaa'irukum ma'akum; a'in zukkirtum; bal antum qawmum musrifoon

36.text: وَجَاءَ مِنْ أَقْصَى الْمَدِينَةِ رَجُلٌ يَسْعَىٰ قَالَ يَا قَوْمِ اتَّبِعُوا الْمُرْسَلِينَ
36.translation: And there came from the farthest end of the city a man, running. He said, "O my people, follow the messengers.
36.transliteration: Wa jaaa'a min aqsal madeenati rajuluny yas'aa qaala yaa qawmit tabi'ul mursaleen

36.text: اتَّبِعُوا مَنْ لَا يَسْأَلُكُمْ أَجْرًا وَهُمْ مُهْتَدُونَ
36.translation: Follow those who do not ask of you [any] payment, and they are [rightly] guided.
36.transliteration: Ittabi'oo mal-laa yas'alukum ajranw-wa hum muhtadoon

36.text: وَمَا لِيَ لَا أَعْبُدُ الَّذِي فَطَرَنِي وَإِلَيْهِ تُرْجَعُونَ
36.translation: And why should I not worship He who created me and to whom you will be returned?
36.transliteration: Wa maa liya laaa a'budul lazee fataranee wa ilaihi turja'oon

36.text: أَأَتَّخِذُ مِنْ دُونِهِ آلِهَةً إِنْ يُرِدْنِ الرَّحْمَٰنُ بِضُرٍّ لَا تُغْنِ عَنِّي شَفَاعَتُهُمْ شَيْئًا وَلَا يُنْقِذُونِ
36.translation: Should I take other than Him [false] deities [while], if the Most Merciful intends for me some adversity, their intercession will not avail me at all, nor can they save me?
36.transliteration: 'A-attakhizu min dooniheee aalihatan iny-yuridnir Rahmaanu bidurril-laa tughni 'annee shafaa 'atuhum shai 'anw-wa laa yunqizoon

36.text: إِنِّي إِذًا لَفِي ضَلَالٍ مُبِينٍ
36.translation: Indeed, I would then be in manifest error.
36.transliteration: Inneee izal-lafee dalaa-lim-mubeen

36.text: إِنِّي آمَنْتُ بِرَبِّكُمْ فَاسْمَعُونِ
36.translation: Indeed, I have believed in your Lord, so listen to me."
36.transliteration: Inneee aamantu bi Rabbikum fasma'oon

36.text: قِيلَ ادْخُلِ الْجَنَّةَ ۖ قَالَ يَا لَيْتَ قَوْمِي يَعْلَمُونَ
36.translation: It was said, "Enter Paradise." He said, "I wish my people could know
36.transliteration: Qeelad khulil Jannnah; qaala yaa laita qawmee ya'lamoon

36.text: بِمَا غَفَرَ لِي رَبِّي وَجَعَلَنِي مِنَ الْمُكْرَمِينَ
36.translation: Of how my Lord has forgiven me and placed me among the honored."
36.transliteration: Bimaa ghafara lee Rabbee wa ja'alanee minal mukrameen

36.text: ۞ وَمَا أَنْزَلْنَا عَلَىٰ قَوْمِهِ مِنْ بَعْدِهِ مِنْ جُنْدٍ مِنَ السَّمَاءِ وَمَا كُنَّا مُنْزِلِينَ
36.translation: And We did not send down upon his people after him any soldiers from the heaven, nor would We have done so.
36.transliteration: Wa maaa anzalnaa 'alaa qawmihee mim ba'dihee min jundim minas-samaaa'i wa maa kunnaa munzileen

36.text: إِنْ كَانَتْ إِلَّا صَيْحَةً وَاحِدَةً فَإِذَا هُمْ خَامِدُونَ
36.translation: It was not but one shout, and immediately they were extinguished.
36.transliteration: In kaanat illaa saihatanw waahidatan fa-izaa hum khaamidoon

36.text: يَا حَسْرَةً عَلَى الْعِبَادِ ۚ مَا يَأْتِيهِمْ مِنْ رَسُولٍ إِلَّا كَانُوا بِهِ يَسْتَهْزِئُونَ
36.translation: How regretful for the servants. There did not come to them any messenger except that they used to ridicule him.
36.transliteration: Yaa hasratan 'alal 'ibaad; maa yaateehim mir Rasoolin illaa kaanoo bihee yastahzi 'oon

36.text: أَلَمْ يَرَوْا كَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا قَبْلَهُمْ مِنَ الْقُرُونِ أَنَّهُمْ إِلَيْهِمْ لَا يَرْجِعُونَ
36.translation: Have they not considered how many generations We destroyed before them - that they to them will not return?
36.transliteration: Alam yaraw kam ahlak naa qablahum minal qurooni annahum ilaihim laa yarji'oon

36.text: وَإِنْ كُلٌّ لَمَّا جَمِيعٌ لَدَيْنَا مُحْضَرُونَ
36.translation: And indeed, all of them will yet be brought present before Us.
36.transliteration: Wa in kullul lammaa jamee'ul-ladainaa muhdaroon

36.text: وَآيَةٌ لَهُمُ الْأَرْضُ الْمَيْتَةُ أَحْيَيْنَاهَا وَأَخْرَجْنَا مِنْهَا حَبًّا فَمِنْهُ يَأْكُلُونَ
36.translation: And a sign for them is the dead earth. We have brought it to life and brought forth from it grain, and from it they eat.
36.transliteration: Wa Aayatul lahumul ardul maitatu ahyainaahaa wa akhrajnaa minhaa habban faminhu yaakuloon

36.text: وَجَعَلْنَا فِيهَا جَنَّاتٍ مِنْ نَخِيلٍ وَأَعْنَابٍ وَفَجَّرْنَا فِيهَا مِنَ الْعُيُونِ
36.translation: And We placed therein gardens of palm trees and grapevines and caused to burst forth therefrom some springs -
36.transliteration: Wa ja'alnaa feehaa jannaatim min nakheelinw wa a'naabinw wa fajjarnaa feeha minal 'uyoon

36.text: لِيَأْكُلُوا مِنْ ثَمَرِهِ وَمَا عَمِلَتْهُ أَيْدِيهِمْ ۖ أَفَلَا يَشْكُرُونَ
36.translation: That they may eat of His fruit. And their hands have not produced it, so will they not be grateful?
36.transliteration: Liyaakuloo min samarihee wa maa 'amilat-hu aideehim; afalaa yashkuroon

36.text: سُبْحَانَ الَّذِي خَلَقَ الْأَزْوَاجَ كُلَّهَا مِمَّا تُنْبِتُ الْأَرْضُ وَمِنْ أَنْفُسِهِمْ وَمِمَّا لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
36.translation: Exalted is He who created all pairs - from what the earth grows and from themselves and from that which they do not know.
36.transliteration: Subhaanal lazee khalaqal azwaaja kullahaa mimmaa tumbitul ardu wa min anfusihim wa mimmaa laa ya'lamoon

36.text: وَآيَةٌ لَهُمُ اللَّيْلُ نَسْلَخُ مِنْهُ النَّهَارَ فَإِذَا هُمْ مُظْلِمُونَ
36.translation: And a sign for them is the night. We remove from it [the light of] day, so they are [left] in darkness.
36.transliteration: Wa Aayatul lahumul lailu naslakhu minhun nahaara fa-izaa hum muzlimoon

36.text: وَالشَّمْسُ تَجْرِي لِمُسْتَقَرٍّ لَهَا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ تَقْدِيرُ الْعَزِيزِ الْعَلِيمِ
36.translation: And the sun runs [on course] toward its stopping point. That is the determination of the Exalted in Might, the Knowing.
36.transliteration: Wash-shamsu tajree limustaqarril lahaa; zaalika taqdeerul 'Azeezil Aleem

36.text: وَالْقَمَرَ قَدَّرْنَاهُ مَنَازِلَ حَتَّىٰ عَادَ كَالْعُرْجُونِ الْقَدِيمِ
36.translation: And the moon - We have determined for it phases, until it returns [appearing] like the old date stalk.
36.transliteration: Walqamara qaddarnaahu manaazila hattaa 'aada kal'ur joonil qadeem

36.text: لَا الشَّمْسُ يَنْبَغِي لَهَا أَنْ تُدْرِكَ الْقَمَرَ وَلَا اللَّيْلُ سَابِقُ النَّهَارِ ۚ وَكُلٌّ فِي فَلَكٍ يَسْبَحُونَ
36.translation: It is not allowable for the sun to reach the moon, nor does the night overtake the day, but each, in an orbit, is swimming.
36.transliteration: Lash shamsu yambaghee lahaaa an tudrikal qamara wa lal lailu saabiqun nahaar; wa kullun fee falaki yasbahoon

36.text: وَآيَةٌ لَهُمْ أَنَّا حَمَلْنَا ذُرِّيَّتَهُمْ فِي الْفُلْكِ الْمَشْحُونِ
36.translation: And a sign for them is that We carried their forefathers in a laden ship.
36.transliteration: Wa Aayatul lahum annaa hamalnaa zurriyatahum fil fulkil mashhoon

36.text: وَخَلَقْنَا لَهُمْ مِنْ مِثْلِهِ مَا يَرْكَبُونَ
36.translation: And We created for them from the likes of it that which they ride.
36.transliteration: Wa khalaqnaa lahum mim-mislihee maa yarkaboon

36.text: وَإِنْ نَشَأْ نُغْرِقْهُمْ فَلَا صَرِيخَ لَهُمْ وَلَا هُمْ يُنْقَذُونَ
36.translation: And if We should will, We could drown them; then no one responding to a cry would there be for them, nor would they be saved
36.transliteration: Wa in nashaa nughriqhum falaa sareekha lahum wa laa hum yunqazoon

36.text: إِلَّا رَحْمَةً مِنَّا وَمَتَاعًا إِلَىٰ حِينٍ
36.translation: Except as a mercy from Us and provision for a time.
36.transliteration: Illaa rahmatam minnaa wa mataa'an ilaa heen

36.text: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ اتَّقُوا مَا بَيْنَ أَيْدِيكُمْ وَمَا خَلْفَكُمْ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُرْحَمُونَ
36.translation: But when it is said to them, "Beware of what is before you and what is behind you; perhaps you will receive mercy... "
36.transliteration: Wa izaa qeela lahumuttaqoo maa baina aideekum wa maa khalfakum la'allakum turhamoon

36.text: وَمَا تَأْتِيهِمْ مِنْ آيَةٍ مِنْ آيَاتِ رَبِّهِمْ إِلَّا كَانُوا عَنْهَا مُعْرِضِينَ
36.translation: And no sign comes to them from the signs of their Lord except that they are from it turning away.
36.transliteration: Wa maa taateehim min aayatim min ayataati Rabbihim illaa kaanoo 'anhaa mu'rideen

36.text: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمْ أَنْفِقُوا مِمَّا رَزَقَكُمُ اللَّهُ قَالَ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا لِلَّذِينَ آمَنُوا أَنُطْعِمُ مَنْ لَوْ يَشَاءُ اللَّهُ أَطْعَمَهُ إِنْ أَنْتُمْ إِلَّا فِي ضَلَالٍ مُبِينٍ
36.translation: And when it is said to them, "Spend from that which Allah has provided for you," those who disbelieve say to those who believe, "Should we feed one whom, if Allah had willed, He would have fed? You are not but in clear error."
36.transliteration: Wa izaa qeela lahum anfiqoo mimmaa razaqakumul laahu qaalal lazeena kafaroo lillazeena aamanooo anut'imu mal-law yashaaa'ul laahu at'amahooo in antum illaa fee dalaalim mubeen

36.text: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَٰذَا الْوَعْدُ إِنْ كُنْتُمْ صَادِقِينَ
36.translation: And they say, "When is this promise, if you should be truthful?"
36.transliteration: Wa yaqooloona mataa haazal wa'du in kuntum saadiqeen

36.text: مَا يَنْظُرُونَ إِلَّا صَيْحَةً وَاحِدَةً تَأْخُذُهُمْ وَهُمْ يَخِصِّمُونَ
36.translation: They do not await except one blast which will seize them while they are disputing.
36.transliteration: Maa yanzuroona illaa saihatanw waahidatan taa khuzuhum wa hum yakhissimoon

36.text: فَلَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ تَوْصِيَةً وَلَا إِلَىٰ أَهْلِهِمْ يَرْجِعُونَ
36.translation: And they will not be able [to give] any instruction, nor to their people can they return.
36.transliteration: Falaa yastatee'oona taw siyatanw-wa laaa ilaaa ahlihim yarji'oon

36.text: وَنُفِخَ فِي الصُّورِ فَإِذَا هُمْ مِنَ الْأَجْدَاثِ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِمْ يَنْسِلُونَ
36.translation: And the Horn will be blown; and at once from the graves to their Lord they will hasten.
36.transliteration: Wa nufikha fis-soori faizaa hum minal ajdaasi ilaa Rabbihim yansiloon

36.text: قَالُوا يَا وَيْلَنَا مَنْ بَعَثَنَا مِنْ مَرْقَدِنَا ۜ ۗ هَٰذَا مَا وَعَدَ الرَّحْمَٰنُ وَصَدَقَ الْمُرْسَلُونَ
36.translation: They will say, "O woe to us! Who has raised us up from our sleeping place?" [The reply will be], "This is what the Most Merciful had promised, and the messengers told the truth."
36.transliteration: Qaaloo yaa wailanaa mam ba'asanaa mim marqadinaa; haaza maa wa'adar Rahmanu wa sadaqal mursaloon

36.text: إِنْ كَانَتْ إِلَّا صَيْحَةً وَاحِدَةً فَإِذَا هُمْ جَمِيعٌ لَدَيْنَا مُحْضَرُونَ
36.translation: It will not be but one blast, and at once they are all brought present before Us.
36.transliteration: In kaanat illaa saihatanw waahidatan fa-izaa hum jamee'ul ladainaa muhdaroon

36.text: فَالْيَوْمَ لَا تُظْلَمُ نَفْسٌ شَيْئًا وَلَا تُجْزَوْنَ إِلَّا مَا كُنْتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
36.translation: So today no soul will be wronged at all, and you will not be recompensed except for what you used to do.
36.transliteration: Fal-Yawma laa tuzlamu nafsun shai'anw-wa laa tujzawna illaa maa kuntum ta'maloon

36.text: إِنَّ أَصْحَابَ الْجَنَّةِ الْيَوْمَ فِي شُغُلٍ فَاكِهُونَ
36.translation: Indeed the companions of Paradise, that Day, will be amused in [joyful] occupation -
36.transliteration: Inna Ashaabal jannatil Yawma fee shughulin faakihoon

36.text: هُمْ وَأَزْوَاجُهُمْ فِي ظِلَالٍ عَلَى الْأَرَائِكِ مُتَّكِئُونَ
36.translation: They and their spouses - in shade, reclining on adorned couches.
36.transliteration: Hum wa azwaajuhum fee zilaalin 'alal araaa'iki muttaki'oon

36.text: لَهُمْ فِيهَا فَاكِهَةٌ وَلَهُمْ مَا يَدَّعُونَ
36.translation: For them therein is fruit, and for them is whatever they request [or wish]
36.transliteration: Lahum feehaa faakiha tunw-wa lahum maa yadda'oon

36.text: سَلَامٌ قَوْلًا مِنْ رَبٍّ رَحِيمٍ
36.translation: [And] "Peace," a word from a Merciful Lord.
36.transliteration: Salaamun qawlam mir Rabbir Raheem

36.text: وَامْتَازُوا الْيَوْمَ أَيُّهَا الْمُجْرِمُونَ
36.translation: [Then He will say], "But stand apart today, you criminals.
36.transliteration: Wamtaazul Yawma ayyuhal mujrimoon

36.text: ۞ أَلَمْ أَعْهَدْ إِلَيْكُمْ يَا بَنِي آدَمَ أَنْ لَا تَعْبُدُوا الشَّيْطَانَ ۖ إِنَّهُ لَكُمْ عَدُوٌّ مُبِينٌ
36.translation: Did I not enjoin upon you, O children of Adam, that you not worship Satan - [for] indeed, he is to you a clear enemy -
36.transliteration: Alam a'had ilaikum yaa Baneee Aadama al-laa ta'budush Shaitaana innahoo lakum 'aduwwum mubeen

36.text: وَأَنِ اعْبُدُونِي ۚ هَٰذَا صِرَاطٌ مُسْتَقِيمٌ
36.translation: And that you worship [only] Me? This is a straight path.
36.transliteration: Wa ani'budoonee; haazaa Siraatum Mustaqeem

36.text: وَلَقَدْ أَضَلَّ مِنْكُمْ جِبِلًّا كَثِيرًا ۖ أَفَلَمْ تَكُونُوا تَعْقِلُونَ
36.translation: And he had already led astray from among you much of creation, so did you not use reason?
36.transliteration: Wa laqad adalla minkum jibillan kaseeraa; afalam takoonoo ta'qiloon

36.text: هَٰذِهِ جَهَنَّمُ الَّتِي كُنْتُمْ تُوعَدُونَ
36.translation: This is the Hellfire which you were promised.
36.transliteration: Haazihee Jahannamul latee kuntum too'adoon

36.text: اصْلَوْهَا الْيَوْمَ بِمَا كُنْتُمْ تَكْفُرُونَ
36.translation: [Enter to] burn therein today for what you used to deny."
36.transliteration: Islawhal Yawma bimaa kuntum takfuroon

36.text: الْيَوْمَ نَخْتِمُ عَلَىٰ أَفْوَاهِهِمْ وَتُكَلِّمُنَا أَيْدِيهِمْ وَتَشْهَدُ أَرْجُلُهُمْ بِمَا كَانُوا يَكْسِبُونَ
36.translation: That Day, We will seal over their mouths, and their hands will speak to Us, and their feet will testify about what they used to earn.
36.transliteration: Al-Yawma nakhtimu 'alaaa afwaahihim wa tukallimunaaa aideehim wa tashhadu arjuluhum bimaa kaanoo yaksiboon

36.text: وَلَوْ نَشَاءُ لَطَمَسْنَا عَلَىٰ أَعْيُنِهِمْ فَاسْتَبَقُوا الصِّرَاطَ فَأَنَّىٰ يُبْصِرُونَ
36.translation: And if We willed, We could have obliterated their eyes, and they would race to [find] the path, and how could they see?
36.transliteration: Wa law nashaaa'u lata masna 'alaaa aiyunihim fasta baqus-siraata fa-annaa yubsiroon

36.text: وَلَوْ نَشَاءُ لَمَسَخْنَاهُمْ عَلَىٰ مَكَانَتِهِمْ فَمَا اسْتَطَاعُوا مُضِيًّا وَلَا يَرْجِعُونَ
36.translation: And if We willed, We could have deformed them, [paralyzing them] in their places so they would not be able to proceed, nor could they return.
36.transliteration: Wa law nashaaa'u lamasakhnaahum 'alaa makaanatihim famas-tataa'oo mudiyyanw-wa laa yarji'oon

36.text: وَمَنْ نُعَمِّرْهُ نُنَكِّسْهُ فِي الْخَلْقِ ۖ أَفَلَا يَعْقِلُونَ
36.translation: And he to whom We grant long life We reverse in creation; so will they not understand?
36.transliteration: Wa man nu 'ammirhu nunakkishu fil-khalq; afalaa ya'qiloon

36.text: وَمَا عَلَّمْنَاهُ الشِّعْرَ وَمَا يَنْبَغِي لَهُ ۚ إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكْرٌ وَقُرْآنٌ مُبِينٌ
36.translation: And We did not give Prophet Muhammad, knowledge of poetry, nor is it befitting for him. It is not but a message and a clear Qur'an
36.transliteration: Wa maa 'allamnaahush shi'ra wa maa yambaghee lah; in huwa illaa zikrunw-wa Qur-aanum mubeen

36.text: لِيُنْذِرَ مَنْ كَانَ حَيًّا وَيَحِقَّ الْقَوْلُ عَلَى الْكَافِرِينَ
36.translation: To warn whoever is alive and justify the word against the disbelievers.
36.transliteration: Liyunzira man kaana haiyanw-wa yahiqqal qawlu 'alal-kaafireen

36.text: أَوَلَمْ يَرَوْا أَنَّا خَلَقْنَا لَهُمْ مِمَّا عَمِلَتْ أَيْدِينَا أَنْعَامًا فَهُمْ لَهَا مَالِكُونَ
36.translation: Do they not see that We have created for them from what Our hands have made, grazing livestock, and [then] they are their owners?
36.transliteration: Awalam yaraw annaa khalaqnaa lahum mimmaa 'amilat aideenaaa an'aaman fahum lahaa maalikoon

36.text: وَذَلَّلْنَاهَا لَهُمْ فَمِنْهَا رَكُوبُهُمْ وَمِنْهَا يَأْكُلُونَ
36.translation: And We have tamed them for them, so some of them they ride, and some of them they eat.
36.transliteration: Wa zallalnaahaa lahum faminhaa rakoobuhum wa minhaa yaakuloon

36.text: وَلَهُمْ فِيهَا مَنَافِعُ وَمَشَارِبُ ۖ أَفَلَا يَشْكُرُونَ
36.translation: And for them therein are [other] benefits and drinks, so will they not be grateful?
36.transliteration: Wa lahum feehaa manaa fi'u wa mashaarib; afalaa yashkuroon

36.text: وَاتَّخَذُوا مِنْ دُونِ اللَّهِ آلِهَةً لَعَلَّهُمْ يُنْصَرُونَ
36.translation: But they have taken besides Allah [false] deities that perhaps they would be helped.
36.transliteration: Wattakhazoo min doonil laahi aalihatal la'allahum yunsaroon

36.text: لَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ نَصْرَهُمْ وَهُمْ لَهُمْ جُنْدٌ مُحْضَرُونَ
36.translation: They are not able to help them, and they [themselves] are for them soldiers in attendance.
36.transliteration: Laa yastatee'oona nasrahum wa hum lahum jundum muhdaroon

36.text: فَلَا يَحْزُنْكَ قَوْلُهُمْ ۘ إِنَّا نَعْلَمُ مَا يُسِرُّونَ وَمَا يُعْلِنُونَ
36.translation: So let not their speech grieve you. Indeed, We know what they conceal and what they declare.
36.transliteration: Falaa yahzunka qawluhum; innaa na'lamu maa yusirroona wa maa yu'linoon

36.text: أَوَلَمْ يَرَ الْإِنْسَانُ أَنَّا خَلَقْنَاهُ مِنْ نُطْفَةٍ فَإِذَا هُوَ خَصِيمٌ مُبِينٌ
36.translation: Does man not consider that We created him from a [mere] sperm-drop - then at once he is a clear adversary?
36.transliteration: Awalam yaral insaanu annaa khalaqnaahu min nutfatin fa-izaa huwa khaseemum mubeen

36.text: وَضَرَبَ لَنَا مَثَلًا وَنَسِيَ خَلْقَهُ ۖ قَالَ مَنْ يُحْيِي الْعِظَامَ وَهِيَ رَمِيمٌ
36.translation: And he presents for Us an example and forgets his [own] creation. He says, "Who will give life to bones while they are disintegrated?"
36.transliteration: Wa daraba lanaa maslanw-wa nasiya khalqahoo qaala mai-yuhyil'izaama wa hiya rameem

36.text: قُلْ يُحْيِيهَا الَّذِي أَنْشَأَهَا أَوَّلَ مَرَّةٍ ۖ وَهُوَ بِكُلِّ خَلْقٍ عَلِيمٌ
36.translation: Say, "He will give them life who produced them the first time; and He is, of all creation, Knowing."
36.transliteration: Qul yuh yeehal lazeee ansha ahaaa awwala marrah; wa Huwa bikulli khalqin 'Aleem

36.text: الَّذِي جَعَلَ لَكُمْ مِنَ الشَّجَرِ الْأَخْضَرِ نَارًا فَإِذَا أَنْتُمْ مِنْهُ تُوقِدُونَ
36.translation: [It is] He who made for you from the green tree, fire, and then from it you ignite.
36.transliteration: Allazee ja'ala lakum minash shajaril akhdari naaran fa-izaaa antum minhu tooqidoon

36.text: أَوَلَيْسَ الَّذِي خَلَقَ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضَ بِقَادِرٍ عَلَىٰ أَنْ يَخْلُقَ مِثْلَهُمْ ۚ بَلَىٰ وَهُوَ الْخَلَّاقُ الْعَلِيمُ
36.translation: Is not He who created the heavens and the earth Able to create the likes of them? Yes, [it is so]; and He is the Knowing Creator.
36.transliteration: Awa laisal lazee khalaqas samaawaati wal arda biqaadirin 'alaaa ai-yakhluqa mislahum; balaa wa Huwal Khallaaqul 'Aleem

36.text: إِنَّمَا أَمْرُهُ إِذَا أَرَادَ شَيْئًا أَنْ يَقُولَ لَهُ كُنْ فَيَكُونُ
36.translation: His command is only when He intends a thing that He says to it, "Be," and it is.
36.transliteration: Innamaa amruhooo izaaa araada shai'an ai-yaqoola lahoo kun fa-yakoon

36.text: فَسُبْحَانَ الَّذِي بِيَدِهِ مَلَكُوتُ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ وَإِلَيْهِ تُرْجَعُونَ
36.translation: So exalted is He in whose hand is the realm of all things, and to Him you will be returned.
36.transliteration: Fa Subhaanal lazee biyadihee malakootu kulli shai-inw-wa ilaihi turja'oon

37.text: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالصَّافَّاتِ صَفًّا
37.translation: By those [angels] lined up in rows
And those who drive [the clouds]
And those who recite the message,
Indeed, your God is One,

37.text: رَبُّ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا وَرَبُّ الْمَشَارِقِ
37.translation: Lord of the heavens and the earth and that between them and Lord of the sunrises.
37.transliteration: Rabbus samaawaati wal ardi wa maa bainahumaa wa Rabbul mashaariq

37.text: إِنَّا زَيَّنَّا السَّمَاءَ الدُّنْيَا بِزِينَةٍ الْكَوَاكِبِ
37.translation: Indeed, We have adorned the nearest heaven with an adornment of stars
37.transliteration: Innaa zaiyannas samaaa 'ad dunyaa bizeenatinil kawaakib

37.translation: And as protection against every rebellious devil
37.transliteration: Wa hifzam min kulli Shaitaanim maarid

37.text: لَا يَسَّمَّعُونَ إِلَى الْمَلَإِ الْأَعْلَىٰ وَيُقْذَفُونَ مِنْ كُلِّ جَانِبٍ
37.translation: [So] they may not listen to the exalted assembly [of angels] and are pelted from every side,
37.transliteration: Laa yassamma 'oona ilal mala il a'alaa wa yuqzafoona min kulli jaanib

37.translation: Repelled; and for them is a constant punishment,

37.text: إِلَّا مَنْ خَطِفَ الْخَطْفَةَ فَأَتْبَعَهُ شِهَابٌ ثَاقِبٌ
37.translation: Except one who snatches [some words] by theft, but they are pursued by a burning flame, piercing [in brightness].
37.transliteration: Illaa man khatifal khatfata fa atba'ahoo shihaabun saaqib

37.text: فَاسْتَفْتِهِمْ أَهُمْ أَشَدُّ خَلْقًا أَمْ مَنْ خَلَقْنَا ۚ إِنَّا خَلَقْنَاهُمْ مِنْ طِينٍ لَازِبٍ
37.translation: Then inquire of them, [O Muhammad], "Are they a stronger [or more difficult] creation or those [others] We have created?" Indeed, We created men from sticky clay.
37.transliteration: Fastaftihim ahum ashaddu khalqan am man khalaqnaa; innaa khalaqnaahum min teenil laazib

37.translation: But you wonder, while they mock,
And when they are reminded, they remember not.
And when they see a sign, they ridicule
37.transliteration: Wa izaa ra aw Aayatinw yastaskhiroon

37.text: وَقَالُوا إِنْ هَٰذَا إِلَّا سِحْرٌ مُبِينٌ
37.translation: And say, "This is not but obvious magic.
37.transliteration: Wa qaalooo in haazaa illaa sihrum mubeen

37.text: أَإِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًا وَعِظَامًا أَإِنَّا لَمَبْعُوثُونَ
37.translation: When we have died and become dust and bones, are we indeed to be resurrected?
37.transliteration: 'A-izaa mitnaa wa kunnaa turaabanw wa 'izaaman 'ainnaa lamab'oosoon

37.translation: And our forefathers [as well]?"
Say, "Yes, and you will be [rendered] contemptible."

37.text: فَإِنَّمَا هِيَ زَجْرَةٌ وَاحِدَةٌ فَإِذَا هُمْ يَنْظُرُونَ
37.translation: It will be only one shout, and at once they will be observing.
37.transliteration: Fa innamaa hiya zajra tunw waahidatun fa izaa hum yanzuroon

37.text: وَقَالُوا يَا وَيْلَنَا هَٰذَا يَوْمُ الدِّينِ
37.translation: They will say, "O woe to us! This is the Day of Recompense."
37.transliteration: Qa qaaloo yaa wailanaa haazaa Yawmud-Deen

37.text: هَٰذَا يَوْمُ الْفَصْلِ الَّذِي كُنْتُمْ بِهِ تُكَذِّبُونَ
37.translation: [They will be told], "This is the Day of Judgement which you used to deny."
37.transliteration: Haazaa Yawmul Faslil lazee kuntum bihee tukaziboon

37.text: ۞ احْشُرُوا الَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا وَأَزْوَاجَهُمْ وَمَا كَانُوا يَعْبُدُونَ
37.translation: [The angels will be ordered], "Gather those who committed wrong, their kinds, and what they used to worship
37.transliteration: Uhshurul lazeena zalamoo wa azwaajahum wa maa kaanoo ya'budoon

37.text: مِنْ دُونِ اللَّهِ فَاهْدُوهُمْ إِلَىٰ صِرَاطِ الْجَحِيمِ
37.translation: Other than Allah, and guide them to the path of Hellfire
37.transliteration: Min doonil laahi fahdoohum ilaa siraatil Jaheem

37.translation: And stop them; indeed, they are to be questioned."
[They will be asked], "What is [wrong] with you? Why do you not help each other?"
But they, that Day, are in surrender.
And they will approach one another blaming each other.

37.text: قَالُوا إِنَّكُمْ كُنْتُمْ تَأْتُونَنَا عَنِ الْيَمِينِ
37.translation: They will say, "Indeed, you used to come at us from the right."
The oppressors will say, "Rather, you [yourselves] were not believers,

37.text: وَمَا كَانَ لَنَا عَلَيْكُمْ مِنْ سُلْطَانٍ ۖ بَلْ كُنْتُمْ قَوْمًا طَاغِينَ
37.translation: And we had over you no authority, but you were a transgressing people.
37.transliteration: Wa maa kaana lanaa 'alaikum min sultaanim bal kuntum qawman taagheen

37.text: فَحَقَّ عَلَيْنَا قَوْلُ رَبِّنَا ۖ إِنَّا لَذَائِقُونَ
37.translation: So the word of our Lord has come into effect upon us; indeed, we will taste [punishment].
And we led you to deviation; indeed, we were deviators."
So indeed they, that Day, will be sharing in the punishment.
Indeed, that is how We deal with the criminals.

37.text: إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا إِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمْ لَا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ يَسْتَكْبِرُونَ
37.translation: Indeed they, when it was said to them, "There is no deity but Allah," were arrogant
37.transliteration: Innahum kaanooo izaa qeela lahum laaa ilaaha illal laahu yastakbiroon

37.text: وَيَقُولُونَ أَئِنَّا لَتَارِكُو آلِهَتِنَا لِشَاعِرٍ مَجْنُونٍ
37.translation: And were saying, "Are we to leave our gods for a mad poet?"
37.transliteration: Wa yaqooloona a'innaa lataarikooo aalihatinaa lishaa'irim majnoon

37.translation: Rather, the Prophet has come with the truth and confirmed the [previous] messengers.
37.transliteration: bal jaaa'a bilhaqqi wa saddaqal mursaleen

37.translation: Indeed, you [disbelievers] will be tasters of the painful punishment,

37.text: وَمَا تُجْزَوْنَ إِلَّا مَا كُنْتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
37.translation: And you will not be recompensed except for what you used to do -
37.transliteration: Wa maa tujzawna illaa maa kuntum ta'maloon

37.translation: But not the chosen servants of Allah.
Those will have a provision determined -
Fruits; and they will be honored
In gardens of pleasure
On thrones facing one another.
There will be circulated among them a cup [of wine] from a flowing spring,
White and delicious to the drinkers;

37.text: لَا فِيهَا غَوْلٌ وَلَا هُمْ عَنْهَا يُنْزَفُونَ
37.translation: No bad effect is there in it, nor from it will they be intoxicated.
37.transliteration: Laa feehaa ghawlunw wa laa hum 'anhaa yunzafoon

37.translation: And with them will be women limiting [their] glances, with large, [beautiful] eyes,
As if they were [delicate] eggs, well-protected.
And they will approach one another, inquiring of each other.

37.text: قَالَ قَائِلٌ مِنْهُمْ إِنِّي كَانَ لِي قَرِينٌ
37.translation: A speaker among them will say, "Indeed, I had a companion [on earth]
37.transliteration: Qaala qaaa'ilum minhum innee kaana lee qareen

37.translation: Who would say, 'Are you indeed of those who believe

37.text: أَإِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًا وَعِظَامًا أَإِنَّا لَمَدِينُونَ
37.translation: That when we have died and become dust and bones, we will indeed be recompensed?'"
37.transliteration: 'A-izaa mitnaa wa kunnaa turaabanw wa 'izaaman 'ainnaa lamadeenoon

37.translation: He will say, "Would you [care to] look?"
And he will look and see him in the midst of the Hellfire.
37.transliteration: Fattala'a fara aahu fee sawaaa'il Jaheem

37.translation: He will say, "By Allah, you almost ruined me.

37.text: وَلَوْلَا نِعْمَةُ رَبِّي لَكُنْتُ مِنَ الْمُحْضَرِينَ
37.translation: If not for the favor of my Lord, I would have been of those brought in [to Hell].
37.transliteration: Wa law laa ni'matu Rabbee lakuntu minal muhdareen

37.translation: Then, are we not to die

37.text: إِلَّا مَوْتَتَنَا الْأُولَىٰ وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمُعَذَّبِينَ
37.translation: Except for our first death, and we will not be punished?"
37.transliteration: Illa mawtatanal oola wa maa nahnu bimu'azzabeen

37.translation: Indeed, this is the great attainment.
For the like of this let the workers [on earth] work.

37.text: أَذَٰلِكَ خَيْرٌ نُزُلًا أَمْ شَجَرَةُ الزَّقُّومِ
37.translation: Is Paradise a better accommodation or the tree of zaqqum?
37.transliteration: Azaalika khairun nuzulan am shajaratuz Zaqqom

37.translation: Indeed, We have made it a torment for the wrongdoers.

37.text: إِنَّهَا شَجَرَةٌ تَخْرُجُ فِي أَصْلِ الْجَحِيمِ
37.translation: Indeed, it is a tree issuing from the bottom of the Hellfire,
37.transliteration: Innahaa shajaratun takhruju feee aslil Jaheem

37.translation: Its emerging fruit as if it was heads of the devils.

37.text: فَإِنَّهُمْ لَآكِلُونَ مِنْهَا فَمَالِئُونَ مِنْهَا الْبُطُونَ
37.translation: And indeed, they will eat from it and fill with it their bellies.
37.transliteration: Fa innahum la aakiloona minhaa famaali'oona minhal butoon

37.text: ثُمَّ إِنَّ لَهُمْ عَلَيْهَا لَشَوْبًا مِنْ حَمِيمٍ
37.translation: Then indeed, they will have after it a mixture of scalding water.
37.transliteration: Summa inna lahum 'alaihaa lashawbam min hameem

37.translation: Then indeed, their return will be to the Hellfire.
37.transliteration: Summa inna marji'ahum la ilal Jaheem

37.translation: Indeed they found their fathers astray.
So they hastened [to follow] in their footsteps.
And there had already strayed before them most of the former peoples,
37.transliteration: Wa laqad dalla qablahum aksarul awwaleen

37.translation: And We had already sent among them warners.
Then look how was the end of those who were warned -
But not the chosen servants of Allah.
And Noah had certainly called Us, and [We are] the best of responders.
37.transliteration: Wa laqad naadaanaa Noohun falani'mal mujeeboon

37.translation: And We saved him and his family from the great affliction.
37.transliteration: Wa jajainaahu wa ahlahoo minal karbil 'azeem

37.translation: And We made his descendants those remaining [on the earth]
And left for him [favorable mention] among later generations:
"Peace upon Noah among the worlds."
Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.
Indeed, he was of Our believing servants.
Then We drowned the disbelievers.
And indeed, among his kind was Abraham,
37.transliteration: Wa ina min shee'atihee la Ibraaheem

37.translation: When he came to his Lord with a sound heart
37.transliteration: Iz jaaa'a Rabbahoo bi qalbin saleem

37.text: إِذْ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ وَقَوْمِهِ مَاذَا تَعْبُدُونَ
37.translation: [And] when he said to his father and his people, "What do you worship?
37.transliteration: Iz qaala li abeehi wa qawmihee maazaa ta'budoon

37.translation: Is it falsehood [as] gods other than Allah you desire?
Then what is your thought about the Lord of the worlds?"
And he cast a look at the stars
And said, "Indeed, I am [about to be] ill."
So they turned away from him, departing.

37.text: فَرَاغَ إِلَىٰ آلِهَتِهِمْ فَقَالَ أَلَا تَأْكُلُونَ
37.translation: Then he turned to their gods and said, "Do you not eat?
37.transliteration: Faraagha ilaaa aalihatihim faqaala alaa taakuloon

37.translation: What is [wrong] with you that you do not speak?"
And he turned upon them a blow with [his] right hand.
Then the people came toward him, hastening.
He said, "Do you worship that which you [yourselves] carve,
While Allah created you and that which you do?"

37.text: قَالُوا ابْنُوا لَهُ بُنْيَانًا فَأَلْقُوهُ فِي الْجَحِيمِ
37.translation: They said, "Construct for him a furnace and throw him into the burning fire."
37.transliteration: Qaalub noo lahoo bun yaanan fa alqoohu fil jaheem

37.translation: And they intended for him a plan, but We made them the most debased.
37.transliteration: Fa araadoo bihee kaidan faja 'alnaahumul asfaleen

37.text: وَقَالَ إِنِّي ذَاهِبٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّي سَيَهْدِينِ
37.translation: And [then] he said, "Indeed, I will go to [where I am ordered by] my Lord; He will guide me.
37.transliteration: Wa qaala innee zaahibun ilaa Rabbee sa yahdeen

37.translation: My Lord, grant me [a child] from among the righteous."
So We gave him good tidings of a forbearing boy.

37.text: فَلَمَّا بَلَغَ مَعَهُ السَّعْيَ قَالَ يَا بُنَيَّ إِنِّي أَرَىٰ فِي الْمَنَامِ أَنِّي أَذْبَحُكَ فَانْظُرْ مَاذَا تَرَىٰ ۚ قَالَ يَا أَبَتِ افْعَلْ مَا تُؤْمَرُ ۖ سَتَجِدُنِي إِنْ شَاءَ اللَّهُ مِنَ الصَّابِرِينَ
37.translation: And when he reached with him [the age of] exertion, he said, "O my son, indeed I have seen in a dream that I [must] sacrifice you, so see what you think." He said, "O my father, do as you are commanded. You will find me, if Allah wills, of the steadfast."
37.transliteration: Falamma balagha ma'a hus sa'ya qaala yaa buniya inneee araa fil manaami anneee azbahuka fanzur maazaa taraa; qaala yaaa abatif 'al maa tu'maru satajidunee in shaaa'allaahu minas saabireen

37.translation: And when they had both submitted and he put him down upon his forehead,
We called to him, "O Abraham,

37.text: قَدْ صَدَّقْتَ الرُّؤْيَا ۚ إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِي الْمُحْسِنِينَ
37.translation: You have fulfilled the vision." Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.
37.transliteration: Qad saddaqtar ru'yaa; innaa kazaalika najzil muhsineen

37.translation: Indeed, this was the clear trial.
And We ransomed him with a great sacrifice,
And We left for him [favorable mention] among later generations:
"Peace upon Abraham."
Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.
Indeed, he was of Our believing servants.
And We gave him good tidings of Isaac, a prophet from among the righteous.
37.transliteration: Wa bashsharnaahu bi Ishaaqa Nabiyayam minas saaliheen

37.text: وَبَارَكْنَا عَلَيْهِ وَعَلَىٰ إِسْحَاقَ ۚ وَمِنْ ذُرِّيَّتِهِمَا مُحْسِنٌ وَظَالِمٌ لِنَفْسِهِ مُبِينٌ
37.translation: And We blessed him and Isaac. But among their descendants is the doer of good and the clearly unjust to himself.
37.transliteration: Wa baaraknaa 'alaihi wa 'alaaa Ishaaq; wa min zurriyya tihimaa muhsinunw wa zaalimul linafshihee mubeen

37.translation: And We did certainly confer favor upon Moses and Aaron.
37.transliteration: Wa laqad mananna alaa Moosaa wa Haaroon

37.translation: And We saved them and their people from the great affliction,
37.transliteration: Wa najjainaahumaa wa qawmahumaa minal karbil 'azeem

37.translation: And We supported them so it was they who overcame.
And We gave them the explicit Scripture,
And We guided them on the straight path.
And We left for them [favorable mention] among later generations:
"Peace upon Moses and Aaron."
Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.
Indeed, they were of Our believing servants.
And indeed, Elias was from among the messengers,
When he said to his people, "Will you not fear Allah?
Do you call upon Ba'l and leave the best of creators -
37.transliteration: Atad'oona Ba'lanw wa tazaroona ahsanal khaaliqeen

37.translation: Allah, your Lord and the Lord of your first forefathers?"
37.transliteration: Allaaha Rabbakum wa Rabba aabaaa'ikumul awwaleen

37.translation: And they denied him, so indeed, they will be brought [for punishment],
Except the chosen servants of Allah.
And We left for him [favorable mention] among later generations:
"Peace upon Elias."
Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.
Indeed, he was of Our believing servants.
And indeed, Lot was among the messengers.
[So mention] when We saved him and his family, all,
Except his wife among those who remained [with the evildoers].
Then We destroyed the others.
And indeed, you pass by them in the morning
And at night. Then will you not use reason?
And indeed, Jonah was among the messengers.
[Mention] when he ran away to the laden ship.
37.transliteration: Iz abaqa ilal fulkil mash hoon

37.translation: And he drew lots and was among the losers.
Then the fish swallowed him, while he was blameworthy.
And had he not been of those who exalt Allah,
37.transliteration: Falaw laaa annahoo kaana minal musabbiheen

37.text: لَلَبِثَ فِي بَطْنِهِ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ يُبْعَثُونَ
37.translation: He would have remained inside its belly until the Day they are resurrected.
37.transliteration: Lalabisa fee batniheee ilaa Yawmi yub'asoon

37.translation: But We threw him onto the open shore while he was ill.
And We caused to grow over him a gourd vine.

37.text: وَأَرْسَلْنَاهُ إِلَىٰ مِائَةِ أَلْفٍ أَوْ يَزِيدُونَ
37.translation: And We sent him to [his people of] a hundred thousand or more.
37.transliteration: Wa arsalnaahu ilaa mi'ati alfin aw yazeedoon

37.translation: And they believed, so We gave them enjoyment [of life] for a time.
37.transliteration: Fa aamanoo famatta' naahum ilaa heen

37.translation: So inquire of them, [O Muhammad], "Does your Lord have daughters while they have sons?
37.transliteration: Fastaftihim ali Rabbikal banaatu wa lahumul banoon

37.text: أَمْ خَلَقْنَا الْمَلَائِكَةَ إِنَاثًا وَهُمْ شَاهِدُونَ
37.translation: Or did We create the angels as females while they were witnesses?"
37.transliteration: Am khalaqnal malaaa'i kata inaasanw wa hm shaahidoon

37.translation: Unquestionably, it is out of their [invented] falsehood that they say,
37.transliteration: Alaaa innahum min ifkihim la yaqooloon

37.translation: " Allah has begotten," and indeed, they are liars.
Has He chosen daughters over sons?
What is [wrong] with you? How do you make judgement?
Then will you not be reminded?
Or do you have a clear authority?
Then produce your scripture, if you should be truthful.
37.transliteration: Faatoo bi Kitaabikum in kuntum saadiqeen

37.text: وَجَعَلُوا بَيْنَهُ وَبَيْنَ الْجِنَّةِ نَسَبًا ۚ وَلَقَدْ عَلِمَتِ الْجِنَّةُ إِنَّهُمْ لَمُحْضَرُونَ
37.translation: And they have claimed between Him and the jinn a lineage, but the jinn have already known that they [who made such claims] will be brought to [punishment].
37.transliteration: Wa ja'aloo bainahoo wa bainal jinnati nasabaa; wa laqad 'alimatil jinnatu innahum lamuhdaroon

37.translation: Exalted is Allah above what they describe,
Except the chosen servants of Allah [who do not share in that sin].
So indeed, you [disbelievers] and whatever you worship,
You cannot tempt [anyone] away from Him
Except he who is to [enter and] burn in the Hellfire.

37.text: وَمَا مِنَّا إِلَّا لَهُ مَقَامٌ مَعْلُومٌ
37.translation: [The angels say], "There is not among us any except that he has a known position.
37.transliteration: Wa maa minnasa illaa lahoo maqaamum ma'loom

37.translation: And indeed, we are those who line up [for prayer].
And indeed, we are those who exalt Allah."
And indeed, the disbelievers used to say,

37.text: لَوْ أَنَّ عِنْدَنَا ذِكْرًا مِنَ الْأَوَّلِينَ
37.translation: "If we had a message from [those of] the former peoples,
We would have been the chosen servants of Allah."
But they disbelieved in it, so they are going to know.
And Our word has already preceded for Our servants, the messengers,
37.transliteration: Wa laqad sabaqat Kalimatunaa li'ibaadinal mursa leen

37.translation: [That] indeed, they would be those given victory
And [that] indeed, Our soldiers will be those who overcome.
So, [O Muhammad], leave them for a time.
And see [what will befall] them, for they are going to see.
Then for Our punishment are they impatient?

37.text: فَإِذَا نَزَلَ بِسَاحَتِهِمْ فَسَاءَ صَبَاحُ الْمُنْذَرِينَ
37.translation: But when it descends in their territory, then evil is the morning of those who were warned.
37.transliteration: Fa izaa nazala bisaahatihim fasaaa'a sabaahul munzareen

37.translation: And leave them for a time.
And see, for they are going to see.

37.text: سُبْحَانَ رَبِّكَ رَبِّ الْعِزَّةِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ
37.translation: Exalted is your Lord, the Lord of might, above what they describe.
And peace upon the messengers.
And praise to Allah, Lord of the worlds.

38.text: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ ص ۚ وَالْقُرْآنِ ذِي الذِّكْرِ
38.translation: Sad. By the Qur'an containing reminder...
38.transliteration: Saaad; wal-Qur-aani ziz zikr

38.text: بَلِ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا فِي عِزَّةٍ وَشِقَاقٍ
38.translation: But those who disbelieve are in pride and dissension.
38.transliteration: Balil lazeena kafaroo fee 'izzatilnw wa shiqaaq

38.text: كَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا مِنْ قَبْلِهِمْ مِنْ قَرْنٍ فَنَادَوْا وَلَاتَ حِينَ مَنَاصٍ
38.translation: How many a generation have We destroyed before them, and they [then] called out; but it was not a time for escape.
38.transliteration: Kam ahlaknaa min qablihim min qarnin fanaadaw wa laata heena manaas

38.text: وَعَجِبُوا أَنْ جَاءَهُمْ مُنْذِرٌ مِنْهُمْ ۖ وَقَالَ الْكَافِرُونَ هَٰذَا سَاحِرٌ كَذَّابٌ
38.translation: And they wonder that there has come to them a warner from among themselves. And the disbelievers say, "This is a magician and a liar.
38.transliteration: Wa 'ajibooo an jaaa'a hum munzirum minhum wa qaalal kaafiroona haazaa saahirun kazzaab

38.text: أَجَعَلَ الْآلِهَةَ إِلَٰهًا وَاحِدًا ۖ إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَشَيْءٌ عُجَابٌ
38.translation: Has he made the gods [only] one God? Indeed, this is a curious thing."
38.transliteration: Aja'alal aalihata Ilaahanw Waahidan inna haazaa lashai'un 'ujaab

38.text: وَانْطَلَقَ الْمَلَأُ مِنْهُمْ أَنِ امْشُوا وَاصْبِرُوا عَلَىٰ آلِهَتِكُمْ ۖ إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَشَيْءٌ يُرَادُ
38.translation: And the eminent among them went forth, [saying], "Continue, and be patient over [the defense of] your gods. Indeed, this is a thing intended.
38.transliteration: Wantalaqal mala-u minhum anim shoo wasbiroo 'alaaa aalihatikum innna haazaa lashai 'uny yuraad

38.text: مَا سَمِعْنَا بِهَٰذَا فِي الْمِلَّةِ الْآخِرَةِ إِنْ هَٰذَا إِلَّا اخْتِلَاقٌ
38.translation: We have not heard of this in the latest religion. This is not but a fabrication.
38.transliteration: Maa sami'naa bihaazaa fil millatil aakhirati in haazaaa illakh tilaaq

38.text: أَأُنْزِلَ عَلَيْهِ الذِّكْرُ مِنْ بَيْنِنَا ۚ بَلْ هُمْ فِي شَكٍّ مِنْ ذِكْرِي ۖ بَلْ لَمَّا يَذُوقُوا عَذَابِ
38.translation: Has the message been revealed to him out of [all of] us?" Rather, they are in doubt about My message. Rather, they have not yet tasted My punishment.
38.transliteration: 'A-unzila 'alaihiz zikru mim baininaa; bal hum fee shakkim min Zikree bal lammaa yazooqoo 'azaab

38.text: أَمْ عِنْدَهُمْ خَزَائِنُ رَحْمَةِ رَبِّكَ الْعَزِيزِ الْوَهَّابِ
38.translation: Or do they have the depositories of the mercy of your Lord, the Exalted in Might, the Bestower?
38.transliteration: Am'indahum khazaaa 'inu rahmati Rabbikal 'Azeezil Wahhab

38.text: أَمْ لَهُمْ مُلْكُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا ۖ فَلْيَرْتَقُوا فِي الْأَسْبَابِ
38.translation: Or is theirs the dominion of the heavens and the earth and what is between them? Then let them ascend through [any] ways of access.
38.transliteration: Am lahum mulkus samaawaati wal ardi wa maa bainahumaa falyartaqoo fil asbaab

38.text: جُنْدٌ مَا هُنَالِكَ مَهْزُومٌ مِنَ الْأَحْزَابِ
38.translation: [They are but] soldiers [who will be] defeated there among the companies [of disbelievers].
38.transliteration: Jundum maa hunaalika mahzoomum minal Ahzaab

38.text: كَذَّبَتْ قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمُ نُوحٍ وَعَادٌ وَفِرْعَوْنُ ذُو الْأَوْتَادِ
38.translation: The people of Noah denied before them, and [the tribe of] 'Aad and Pharaoh, the owner of stakes,
38.transliteration: Kazzabat qablahum qawmu Lootinw-wa 'Aadunw wa Fir'awnu zul awtaad

38.text: وَثَمُودُ وَقَوْمُ لُوطٍ وَأَصْحَابُ الْأَيْكَةِ ۚ أُولَٰئِكَ الْأَحْزَابُ
38.translation: And [the tribe of] Thamud and the people of Lot and the companions of the thicket. Those are the companies.
38.transliteration: Wa Samoodu wa qawmu Lootinw wa Ashaabul 'Aykah; ulaaa'ikal Ahzaab

38.text: إِنْ كُلٌّ إِلَّا كَذَّبَ الرُّسُلَ فَحَقَّ عِقَابِ
38.translation: Each of them denied the messengers, so My penalty was justified.
38.transliteration: In kullun illaa kazzabar Rusula fahaqqa 'iqaab

38.text: وَمَا يَنْظُرُ هَٰؤُلَاءِ إِلَّا صَيْحَةً وَاحِدَةً مَا لَهَا مِنْ فَوَاقٍ
38.translation: And these [disbelievers] await not but one blast [of the Horn]; for it there will be no delay.
38.transliteration: Wa maa yanzuru haaa ulaaa'i illaa saihatanw waahidatam maa lahaa min fawaaq

38.text: وَقَالُوا رَبَّنَا عَجِّلْ لَنَا قِطَّنَا قَبْلَ يَوْمِ الْحِسَابِ
38.translation: And they say, "Our Lord, hasten for us our share [of the punishment] before the Day of Account"
38.transliteration: Wa qaaloo Rabbanaa 'ajjil lanaa qittanaa qabla Yawmil Hisaab

38.text: اصْبِرْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَاذْكُرْ عَبْدَنَا دَاوُودَ ذَا الْأَيْدِ ۖ إِنَّهُ أَوَّابٌ
38.translation: Be patient over what they say and remember Our servant, David, the possessor of strength; indeed, he was one who repeatedly turned back [to Allah].
38.transliteration: Isbir 'alaa maa yaqooloona wazkur 'abdanaa Daawooda zal aidi aidi innahooo awwaab

38.text: إِنَّا سَخَّرْنَا الْجِبَالَ مَعَهُ يُسَبِّحْنَ بِالْعَشِيِّ وَالْإِشْرَاقِ
38.translation: Indeed, We subjected the mountains [to praise] with him, exalting [Allah] in the [late] afternoon and [after] sunrise.
38.transliteration: Innaa sakhkharnal jibaala ma'ahoo yusabbihna bil'ashaiyi wal ishraaq

38.text: وَالطَّيْرَ مَحْشُورَةً ۖ كُلٌّ لَهُ أَوَّابٌ
38.translation: And the birds were assembled, all with him repeating [praises].
38.transliteration: Wattayra mahshoorah; kullul lahooo awwaab

38.text: وَشَدَدْنَا مُلْكَهُ وَآتَيْنَاهُ الْحِكْمَةَ وَفَصْلَ الْخِطَابِ
38.translation: And We strengthened his kingdom and gave him wisdom and discernment in speech.
38.transliteration: Wa shadadnaa mulkahoo wa aatainaahul Hikmata wa faslal khitaab

38.text: ۞ وَهَلْ أَتَاكَ نَبَأُ الْخَصْمِ إِذْ تَسَوَّرُوا الْمِحْرَابَ
38.translation: And has there come to you the news of the adversaries, when they climbed over the wall of [his] prayer chamber -
38.transliteration: Wa hal ataaka naba'ul khasm; iz tasawwarul mihraab

38.text: إِذْ دَخَلُوا عَلَىٰ دَاوُودَ فَفَزِعَ مِنْهُمْ ۖ قَالُوا لَا تَخَفْ ۖ خَصْمَانِ بَغَىٰ بَعْضُنَا عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ فَاحْكُمْ بَيْنَنَا بِالْحَقِّ وَلَا تُشْطِطْ وَاهْدِنَا إِلَىٰ سَوَاءِ الصِّرَاطِ
38.translation: When they entered upon David and he was alarmed by them? They said, "Fear not. [We are] two adversaries, one of whom has wronged the other, so judge between us with truth and do not exceed [it] and guide us to the sound path.
38.transliteration: Iz dakhaloo 'alaa Daawooda fafazi'a minhum qaaloo la takhaf khasmaani baghaa ba'dunaa 'alaa ba'din fahkum bainanaaa bilhaqqi wa laa tushtit wahdinaaa ilaa Sawaaa'is Siraat

38.text: إِنَّ هَٰذَا أَخِي لَهُ تِسْعٌ وَتِسْعُونَ نَعْجَةً وَلِيَ نَعْجَةٌ وَاحِدَةٌ فَقَالَ أَكْفِلْنِيهَا وَعَزَّنِي فِي الْخِطَابِ
38.translation: Indeed this, my brother, has ninety-nine ewes, and I have one ewe; so he said, 'Entrust her to me,' and he overpowered me in speech."
38.transliteration: Inna haazaaa akhee lahoo tis'unw wa tis'oona na'jatanw wa liya na'jatunw waahidah; faqaala akfilneeha wa 'azzanee filkhitaab

38.text: قَالَ لَقَدْ ظَلَمَكَ بِسُؤَالِ نَعْجَتِكَ إِلَىٰ نِعَاجِهِ ۖ وَإِنَّ كَثِيرًا مِنَ الْخُلَطَاءِ لَيَبْغِي بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ إِلَّا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ وَقَلِيلٌ مَا هُمْ ۗ وَظَنَّ دَاوُودُ أَنَّمَا فَتَنَّاهُ فَاسْتَغْفَرَ رَبَّهُ وَخَرَّ رَاكِعًا وَأَنَابَ ۩
38.translation: [David] said, "He has certainly wronged you in demanding your ewe [in addition] to his ewes. And indeed, many associates oppress one another, except for those who believe and do righteous deeds - and few are they." And David became certain that We had tried him, and he asked forgiveness of his Lord and fell down bowing [in prostration] and turned in repentance [to Allah].
38.transliteration: Qaala laqad zalamaka bisu 'aali na'jatika ilaa ni'aajihee wa inna kaseeram minal khulataaa'i la-yabghee ba'duhum 'alaa ba'din illal lazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaati wa qaleehum maa hum; wa zanna Daawoodu annamaa fatannaahu fastaghrara Rabbahoo wa kharra raaki'anw wa anaab

38.text: فَغَفَرْنَا لَهُ ذَٰلِكَ ۖ وَإِنَّ لَهُ عِنْدَنَا لَزُلْفَىٰ وَحُسْنَ مَآبٍ
38.translation: So We forgave him that; and indeed, for him is nearness to Us and a good place of return.
38.transliteration: Faghafarnaa lahoo zaalik; wa inna lahoo 'indanaa lazulfaa wa husna ma aab

38.text: يَا دَاوُودُ إِنَّا جَعَلْنَاكَ خَلِيفَةً فِي الْأَرْضِ فَاحْكُمْ بَيْنَ النَّاسِ بِالْحَقِّ وَلَا تَتَّبِعِ الْهَوَىٰ فَيُضِلَّكَ عَنْ سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ ۚ إِنَّ الَّذِينَ يَضِلُّونَ عَنْ سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ لَهُمْ عَذَابٌ شَدِيدٌ بِمَا نَسُوا يَوْمَ الْحِسَابِ
38.translation: [We said], "O David, indeed We have made you a successor upon the earth, so judge between the people in truth and do not follow [your own] desire, as it will lead you astray from the way of Allah." Indeed, those who go astray from the way of Allah will have a severe punishment for having forgotten the Day of Account.
38.transliteration: Yaa Daawoodu innaa ja'alnaaka khaleefatan fil ardi fahkum bainan naasi bilhaqqi wa laa tattabi'il hawaa fayudillaka 'an sabeelil laah; innal lazeena yadilloona 'an sabeelil laah; lahum 'azaabun shadeedum bimaa nasoo Yawmal Hisaab

38.text: وَمَا خَلَقْنَا السَّمَاءَ وَالْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا بَاطِلًا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ ظَنُّ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا ۚ فَوَيْلٌ لِلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا مِنَ النَّارِ
38.translation: And We did not create the heaven and the earth and that between them aimlessly. That is the assumption of those who disbelieve, so woe to those who disbelieve from the Fire.
38.transliteration: Wa ma khalaqnas samaaa'a wal arda wa maa bainahumaa baatilaa; zaalika zannul lazeena kafaroo; fawi lul lillazeena kafaroo minan Naar

38.text: أَمْ نَجْعَلُ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ كَالْمُفْسِدِينَ فِي الْأَرْضِ أَمْ نَجْعَلُ الْمُتَّقِينَ كَالْفُجَّارِ
38.translation: Or should we treat those who believe and do righteous deeds like corrupters in the land? Or should We treat those who fear Allah like the wicked?
38.transliteration: Am naj'alul lazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaati kalmufisdeena fil ardi am naj'alul muttaqeena kalfujjaar

38.text: كِتَابٌ أَنْزَلْنَاهُ إِلَيْكَ مُبَارَكٌ لِيَدَّبَّرُوا آيَاتِهِ وَلِيَتَذَكَّرَ أُولُو الْأَلْبَابِ
38.translation: [This is] a blessed Book which We have revealed to you, [O Muhammad], that they might reflect upon its verses and that those of understanding would be reminded.
38.transliteration: Kitaabun anzalnaahu ilaika mubaarakul liyaddabbarooo Aayaatihee wa liyatazakkara ulul albaab

38.text: وَوَهَبْنَا لِدَاوُودَ سُلَيْمَانَ ۚ نِعْمَ الْعَبْدُ ۖ إِنَّهُ أَوَّابٌ
38.translation: And to David We gave Solomon. An excellent servant, indeed he was one repeatedly turning back [to Allah].
38.transliteration: Wa wahabnaa li Daawooda Sulaimaan; ni'mal 'abd; innahoo awwaab

38.text: إِذْ عُرِضَ عَلَيْهِ بِالْعَشِيِّ الصَّافِنَاتُ الْجِيَادُ
38.translation: [Mention] when there were exhibited before him in the afternoon the poised [standing] racehorses.
38.transliteration: Iz 'urida 'alaihi bil'ashiy yis saafinaatul jiyaad

38.text: فَقَالَ إِنِّي أَحْبَبْتُ حُبَّ الْخَيْرِ عَنْ ذِكْرِ رَبِّي حَتَّىٰ تَوَارَتْ بِالْحِجَابِ
38.translation: And he said, "Indeed, I gave preference to the love of good [things] over the remembrance of my Lord until the sun disappeared into the curtain [of darkness]."
38.transliteration: Faqaala inneee ahbabtu hubbal khairi 'an zikri Rabbee hattaa tawaarat bilhijaab

38.text: رُدُّوهَا عَلَيَّ ۖ فَطَفِقَ مَسْحًا بِالسُّوقِ وَالْأَعْنَاقِ
38.translation: [He said], "Return them to me," and set about striking [their] legs and necks.
38.transliteration: Ruddoohaa 'alaiya fatafiqa masham bissooqi wal a'naaq

38.text: وَلَقَدْ فَتَنَّا سُلَيْمَانَ وَأَلْقَيْنَا عَلَىٰ كُرْسِيِّهِ جَسَدًا ثُمَّ أَنَابَ
38.translation: And We certainly tried Solomon and placed on his throne a body; then he returned.
38.transliteration: Wa laqad fatannaa Sulaimaana wa alqainaa 'alaa kursiyyihee jasadan summa anaab

38.text: قَالَ رَبِّ اغْفِرْ لِي وَهَبْ لِي مُلْكًا لَا يَنْبَغِي لِأَحَدٍ مِنْ بَعْدِي ۖ إِنَّكَ أَنْتَ الْوَهَّابُ
38.translation: He said, "My Lord, forgive me and grant me a kingdom such as will not belong to anyone after me. Indeed, You are the Bestower."
38.transliteration: Qaala Rabbigh fir lee wa hab lee mulkal laa yambaghee li ahadim mim ba'de inaka Antal Wahhab

38.text: فَسَخَّرْنَا لَهُ الرِّيحَ تَجْرِي بِأَمْرِهِ رُخَاءً حَيْثُ أَصَابَ
38.translation: So We subjected to him the wind blowing by his command, gently, wherever he directed,
38.transliteration: Fasakhkharnaa lahur reeha tajree bi amrihee rukhaaa'an haisu asaab

38.text: وَالشَّيَاطِينَ كُلَّ بَنَّاءٍ وَغَوَّاصٍ
38.translation: And [also] the devils [of jinn] - every builder and diver
38.transliteration: Wash Shayaateena kulla bannaaa'inw wa ghawwaas

38.text: وَآخَرِينَ مُقَرَّنِينَ فِي الْأَصْفَادِ
38.translation: And others bound together in shackles.
38.transliteration: Wa aakhareena muqarraneena fil asfaad

38.text: هَٰذَا عَطَاؤُنَا فَامْنُنْ أَوْ أَمْسِكْ بِغَيْرِ حِسَابٍ
38.translation: [We said], "This is Our gift, so grant or withhold without account."
38.transliteration: Haazaa 'ataaa'unaa famnun aw amsik bighairi hisaab

38.text: وَإِنَّ لَهُ عِنْدَنَا لَزُلْفَىٰ وَحُسْنَ مَآبٍ
38.translation: And indeed, for him is nearness to Us and a good place of return.
38.transliteration: Wa inna lahoo 'indanaa lazulfaa wa husna ma-aab

38.text: وَاذْكُرْ عَبْدَنَا أَيُّوبَ إِذْ نَادَىٰ رَبَّهُ أَنِّي مَسَّنِيَ الشَّيْطَانُ بِنُصْبٍ وَعَذَابٍ
38.translation: And remember Our servant Job, when he called to his Lord, "Indeed, Satan has touched me with hardship and torment."
38.transliteration: Wazkur 'abdanaaa Ayyoob; iz naada Rabbahooo annee massaniyash Shaitaanu binus binw wa 'azaab

38.text: ارْكُضْ بِرِجْلِكَ ۖ هَٰذَا مُغْتَسَلٌ بَارِدٌ وَشَرَابٌ
38.translation: [So he was told], "Strike [the ground] with your foot; this is a [spring for] a cool bath and drink."
38.transliteration: Urkud birijlika haaza mughtasalum baaridunw wa sharaab

38.text: وَوَهَبْنَا لَهُ أَهْلَهُ وَمِثْلَهُمْ مَعَهُمْ رَحْمَةً مِنَّا وَذِكْرَىٰ لِأُولِي الْأَلْبَابِ
38.translation: And We granted him his family and a like [number] with them as mercy from Us and a reminder for those of understanding.
38.transliteration: Wa wahabnaa lahoo ahlahoo wa mislahum ma'ahum rahmatam minna wa zikraa li ulil albaab

38.text: وَخُذْ بِيَدِكَ ضِغْثًا فَاضْرِبْ بِهِ وَلَا تَحْنَثْ ۗ إِنَّا وَجَدْنَاهُ صَابِرًا ۚ نِعْمَ الْعَبْدُ ۖ إِنَّهُ أَوَّابٌ
38.translation: [We said], "And take in your hand a bunch [of grass] and strike with it and do not break your oath." Indeed, We found him patient, an excellent servant. Indeed, he was one repeatedly turning back [to Allah].
38.transliteration: Wa khuz biyadika dighsan fadrib bihee wa laa tahnas, innaa wajadnaahu saabiraa; ni'mal 'abd; innahooo awwaab

38.text: وَاذْكُرْ عِبَادَنَا إِبْرَاهِيمَ وَإِسْحَاقَ وَيَعْقُوبَ أُولِي الْأَيْدِي وَالْأَبْصَارِ
38.translation: And remember Our servants, Abraham, Isaac and Jacob - those of strength and [religious] vision.
38.transliteration: Wazkur 'ibaadanaaa Ibraaheema wa Is-haaqa wa Ya'qooba ulil-aydee walabsaar

38.text: إِنَّا أَخْلَصْنَاهُمْ بِخَالِصَةٍ ذِكْرَى الدَّارِ
38.translation: Indeed, We chose them for an exclusive quality: remembrance of the home [of the Hereafter].
38.transliteration: Innaaa akhlasnaahum bi khaalisatin zikrad daar

38.text: وَإِنَّهُمْ عِنْدَنَا لَمِنَ الْمُصْطَفَيْنَ الْأَخْيَارِ
38.translation: And indeed they are, to Us, among the chosen and outstanding.
38.transliteration: Wa innahum 'indanaa laminal mustafainal akhyaar

38.text: وَاذْكُرْ إِسْمَاعِيلَ وَالْيَسَعَ وَذَا الْكِفْلِ ۖ وَكُلٌّ مِنَ الْأَخْيَارِ
38.translation: And remember Ishmael, Elisha and Dhul-Kifl, and all are among the outstanding.
38.transliteration: Wazkur Ismaa'eela wal Yasa'a wa Zal-Kifli wa kullum minal akhyaar

38.text: هَٰذَا ذِكْرٌ ۚ وَإِنَّ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ لَحُسْنَ مَآبٍ
38.translation: This is a reminder. And indeed, for the righteous is a good place of return
38.transliteration: Haazaa zikr; wa inna lilmuttaqeena lahusna ma aab

38.text: جَنَّاتِ عَدْنٍ مُفَتَّحَةً لَهُمُ الْأَبْوَابُ
38.translation: Gardens of perpetual residence, whose doors will be opened to them.
38.transliteration: Jannaati 'adnim mufat tahatal lahumul abwaab

38.text: مُتَّكِئِينَ فِيهَا يَدْعُونَ فِيهَا بِفَاكِهَةٍ كَثِيرَةٍ وَشَرَابٍ
38.translation: Reclining within them, they will call therein for abundant fruit and drink.
38.transliteration: Muttaki'eena feehaa yad'oona feehaa bifaakihatin kaseeratinw wa sharaab

38.text: ۞ وَعِنْدَهُمْ قَاصِرَاتُ الطَّرْفِ أَتْرَابٌ
38.translation: And with them will be women limiting [their] glances and of equal age.
38.transliteration: Wa 'indahum qaasiraatut tarfi atraab

38.text: هَٰذَا مَا تُوعَدُونَ لِيَوْمِ الْحِسَابِ
38.translation: This is what you, [the righteous], are promised for the Day of Account.
38.transliteration: Haaza maa too'odoona li Yawmil Hisaab

38.text: إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَرِزْقُنَا مَا لَهُ مِنْ نَفَادٍ
38.translation: Indeed, this is Our provision; for it there is no depletion.
38.transliteration: Inna haazaa larizqunaa maa lahoo min nafaad

38.text: هَٰذَا ۚ وَإِنَّ لِلطَّاغِينَ لَشَرَّ مَآبٍ
38.translation: This [is so]. But indeed, for the transgressors is an evil place of return -
38.transliteration: Haazaa; wa inna littaagheena lasharra ma-aab

38.text: جَهَنَّمَ يَصْلَوْنَهَا فَبِئْسَ الْمِهَادُ
38.translation: Hell, which they will [enter to] burn, and wretched is the resting place.
38.transliteration: Jahannama yaslawnahaa fai'sal mihaad

38.text: هَٰذَا فَلْيَذُوقُوهُ حَمِيمٌ وَغَسَّاقٌ
38.translation: This - so let them taste it - is scalding water and [foul] purulence.
38.transliteration: Haazaa falyazooqoohu hameemunw wa ghassaaq

38.text: وَآخَرُ مِنْ شَكْلِهِ أَزْوَاجٌ
38.translation: And other [punishments] of its type [in various] kinds.
38.transliteration: Wa aakharu min shak liheee azwaaj

38.text: هَٰذَا فَوْجٌ مُقْتَحِمٌ مَعَكُمْ ۖ لَا مَرْحَبًا بِهِمْ ۚ إِنَّهُمْ صَالُو النَّارِ
38.translation: [Its inhabitants will say], "This is a company bursting in with you. No welcome for them. Indeed, they will burn in the Fire."
38.transliteration: Haazaa fawjum muqtahimum ma'akum laa marhabam bihim; innahum saalun Naar

38.text: قَالُوا بَلْ أَنْتُمْ لَا مَرْحَبًا بِكُمْ ۖ أَنْتُمْ قَدَّمْتُمُوهُ لَنَا ۖ فَبِئْسَ الْقَرَارُ
38.translation: They will say, "Nor you! No welcome for you. You, [our leaders], brought this upon us, and wretched is the settlement."
38.transliteration: Qaaloo bal antum laa marhabam bikum; antum qaddamtumoohu lanaa fabi'sal qaraar

38.text: قَالُوا رَبَّنَا مَنْ قَدَّمَ لَنَا هَٰذَا فَزِدْهُ عَذَابًا ضِعْفًا فِي النَّارِ
38.translation: They will say, "Our Lord, whoever brought this upon us - increase for him double punishment in the Fire."
38.transliteration: Qaaloo Rabbanaa man qaddama lanaa haaza fazidhu 'azaaban di'fan fin Naar

38.text: وَقَالُوا مَا لَنَا لَا نَرَىٰ رِجَالًا كُنَّا نَعُدُّهُمْ مِنَ الْأَشْرَارِ
38.translation: And they will say, "Why do we not see men whom we used to count among the worst?
38.transliteration: Wa qaaloo ma lanaa laa naraa rijaalan kunnaa na'udduhum minal ashraar

38.text: أَتَّخَذْنَاهُمْ سِخْرِيًّا أَمْ زَاغَتْ عَنْهُمُ الْأَبْصَارُ
38.translation: Is it [because] we took them in ridicule, or has [our] vision turned away from them?"
38.transliteration: Attakhaznaahum sikh riyyan am zaaghat 'anhumul absaar

38.text: إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ لَحَقٌّ تَخَاصُمُ أَهْلِ النَّارِ
38.translation: Indeed, that is truth - the quarreling of the people of the Fire.
38.transliteration: Inna zaalika lahaqqun takhaasumu Ahlin Naar

38.text: قُلْ إِنَّمَا أَنَا مُنْذِرٌ ۖ وَمَا مِنْ إِلَٰهٍ إِلَّا اللَّهُ الْوَاحِدُ الْقَهَّارُ
38.translation: Say, [O Muhammad], "I am only a warner, and there is not any deity except Allah, the One, the Prevailing.
38.transliteration: Qul innamaaa ana munzirunw wa maa min ilaahim illal laahul Waahidul Qahhaar

38.text: رَبُّ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا الْعَزِيزُ الْغَفَّارُ
38.translation: Lord of the heavens and the earth and whatever is between them, the Exalted in Might, the Perpetual Forgiver."
38.transliteration: Rabbus samaawaati wal ardi wa maa bainahumal 'Azeezul Ghaffaar

38.text: قُلْ هُوَ نَبَأٌ عَظِيمٌ
38.translation: Say, "It is great news
38.transliteration: Qul huwa naba'un 'azeem

38.text: أَنْتُمْ عَنْهُ مُعْرِضُونَ
38.translation: From which you turn away.
38.transliteration: Antum 'anhu mu'ridoon

38.text: مَا كَانَ لِيَ مِنْ عِلْمٍ بِالْمَلَإِ الْأَعْلَىٰ إِذْ يَخْتَصِمُونَ
38.translation: I had no knowledge of the exalted assembly [of angels] when they were disputing [the creation of Adam].
38.transliteration: Maa kaana liya min 'ilmim bilmala il a'laaa iz yakhtasimoon

38.text: إِنْ يُوحَىٰ إِلَيَّ إِلَّا أَنَّمَا أَنَا نَذِيرٌ مُبِينٌ
38.translation: It has not been revealed to me except that I am a clear warner."
38.transliteration: Iny-yoohaaa ilaiya illaaa annnamaaa ana nazeerum mubeen

38.text: إِذْ قَالَ رَبُّكَ لِلْمَلَائِكَةِ إِنِّي خَالِقٌ بَشَرًا مِنْ طِينٍ
38.translation: [So mention] when your Lord said to the angels, "Indeed, I am going to create a human being from clay.
38.transliteration: Iz qaala Rabbuka lilmalaaa'ikati innee khaaliqum basharam min teen

38.text: فَإِذَا سَوَّيْتُهُ وَنَفَخْتُ فِيهِ مِنْ رُوحِي فَقَعُوا لَهُ سَاجِدِينَ
38.translation: So when I have proportioned him and breathed into him of My [created] soul, then fall down to him in prostration."
38.transliteration: Fa-iza sawwaituhoo wa nafakhtu feehi mir roohee faqa'oo lahoo saajideen

38.text: فَسَجَدَ الْمَلَائِكَةُ كُلُّهُمْ أَجْمَعُونَ
38.translation: So the angels prostrated - all of them entirely.
38.transliteration: Fasajadal malaaa'ikatu kulluhum ajma'oon

38.text: إِلَّا إِبْلِيسَ اسْتَكْبَرَ وَكَانَ مِنَ الْكَافِرِينَ
38.translation: Except Iblees; he was arrogant and became among the disbelievers.
38.transliteration: Illaaa Iblees; istakbara wa kaana minal kaafireen

38.text: قَالَ يَا إِبْلِيسُ مَا مَنَعَكَ أَنْ تَسْجُدَ لِمَا خَلَقْتُ بِيَدَيَّ ۖ أَسْتَكْبَرْتَ أَمْ كُنْتَ مِنَ الْعَالِينَ
38.translation: [Allah] said, "O Iblees, what prevented you from prostrating to that which I created with My hands? Were you arrogant [then], or were you [already] among the haughty?"
38.transliteration: Qaala yaaa Ibleesu maa man'aka an tasjuda limaa khalaqtu biyadai; astakbarta am kunta min 'aaleen

38.text: قَالَ أَنَا خَيْرٌ مِنْهُ ۖ خَلَقْتَنِي مِنْ نَارٍ وَخَلَقْتَهُ مِنْ طِينٍ
38.translation: He said, "I am better than him. You created me from fire and created him from clay."
38.transliteration: Qaala ana khairum minah; khalaqtanee min naarinw wa khalaqtahoo min teen

38.text: قَالَ فَاخْرُجْ مِنْهَا فَإِنَّكَ رَجِيمٌ
38.translation: [Allah] said, "Then get out of Paradise, for indeed, you are expelled.
38.transliteration: Qaala fakhruj minhaa fainnaka rajeem

38.text: وَإِنَّ عَلَيْكَ لَعْنَتِي إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ الدِّينِ
38.translation: And indeed, upon you is My curse until the Day of Recompense."
38.transliteration: Wa inna 'alaika la'nateee ilaa Yawmid Deen

38.text: قَالَ رَبِّ فَأَنْظِرْنِي إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ يُبْعَثُونَ
38.translation: He said, "My Lord, then reprieve me until the Day they are resurrected."
38.transliteration: Qaala Rabbi fa anzirneee ilaa Yawmi yub'asoon

38.text: قَالَ فَإِنَّكَ مِنَ الْمُنْظَرِينَ
38.translation: [Allah] said, "So indeed, you are of those reprieved
38.transliteration: Qaala fa innaka minal munzareen

38.text: إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ الْوَقْتِ الْمَعْلُومِ
38.translation: Until the Day of the time well-known."
38.transliteration: Ilaa Yawmil waqtil ma'loom

38.text: قَالَ فَبِعِزَّتِكَ لَأُغْوِيَنَّهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
38.translation: [Iblees] said, "By your might, I will surely mislead them all
38.transliteration: Qaala fabi'izzatika la ughwiyannahum ajma'een

38.text: إِلَّا عِبَادَكَ مِنْهُمُ الْمُخْلَصِينَ
38.translation: Except, among them, Your chosen servants."
38.transliteration: Illaa 'ibaadaka minhumul mukhlaseen

38.text: قَالَ فَالْحَقُّ وَالْحَقَّ أَقُولُ
38.translation: [Allah] said, "The truth [is My oath], and the truth I say -
38.transliteration: Qaala falhaqq, walhaqqa aqool

38.text: لَأَمْلَأَنَّ جَهَنَّمَ مِنْكَ وَمِمَّنْ تَبِعَكَ مِنْهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
38.translation: [That] I will surely fill Hell with you and those of them that follow you all together."
38.transliteration: La amla'annna Jahannama minka wa mimman tabi'aka minhum ajma'een

38.text: قُلْ مَا أَسْأَلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍ وَمَا أَنَا مِنَ الْمُتَكَلِّفِينَ
38.translation: Say, [O Muhammad], "I do not ask you for the Qur'an any payment, and I am not of the pretentious
38.transliteration: Qul maaa as'alukum 'alaihi min ajrinw wa maaa ana minal mutakallifeen

38.text: إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكْرٌ لِلْعَالَمِينَ
38.translation: It is but a reminder to the worlds.
38.transliteration: In huwa illaa zikrul lil'aalameen

38.text: وَلَتَعْلَمُنَّ نَبَأَهُ بَعْدَ حِينٍ
38.translation: And you will surely know [the truth of] its information after a time."
38.transliteration: Wa lata'lamunna naba ahoo ba'da heen

39.text: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ تَنْزِيلُ الْكِتَابِ مِنَ اللَّهِ الْعَزِيزِ الْحَكِيمِ
39.translation: The revelation of the Qur'an is from Allah, the Exalted in Might, the Wise.
39.transliteration: Tanzeelul Kitaabi minal laahil 'Azeezil Hakeem

39.text: إِنَّا أَنْزَلْنَا إِلَيْكَ الْكِتَابَ بِالْحَقِّ فَاعْبُدِ اللَّهَ مُخْلِصًا لَهُ الدِّينَ
39.translation: Indeed, We have sent down to you the Book, [O Muhammad], in truth. So worship Allah, [being] sincere to Him in religion.
39.transliteration: Innaaa anzalnaaa ilaikal Kitaaba bilhaqqi fa'budil laaha mukhlisal lahud deen

39.text: أَلَا لِلَّهِ الدِّينُ الْخَالِصُ ۚ وَالَّذِينَ اتَّخَذُوا مِنْ دُونِهِ أَوْلِيَاءَ مَا نَعْبُدُهُمْ إِلَّا لِيُقَرِّبُونَا إِلَى اللَّهِ زُلْفَىٰ إِنَّ اللَّهَ يَحْكُمُ بَيْنَهُمْ فِي مَا هُمْ فِيهِ يَخْتَلِفُونَ ۗ إِنَّ اللَّهَ لَا يَهْدِي مَنْ هُوَ كَاذِبٌ كَفَّارٌ
39.translation: Unquestionably, for Allah is the pure religion. And those who take protectors besides Him [say], "We only worship them that they may bring us nearer to Allah in position." Indeed, Allah will judge between them concerning that over which they differ. Indeed, Allah does not guide he who is a liar and [confirmed] disbeliever.
39.transliteration: Alaa lillaahid deenul khaalis; wallazeenat takhazoo min dooniheee awliyaaa'a maa na'buduhum illaa liyuqar riboonaaa ilal laahi zulfaa; innal laaha yahkumu baina hum fee maa hum feehi yakhtalifoon; innal laaha laa yahdee man huwa kaazibun kaffaar

39.text: لَوْ أَرَادَ اللَّهُ أَنْ يَتَّخِذَ وَلَدًا لَاصْطَفَىٰ مِمَّا يَخْلُقُ مَا يَشَاءُ ۚ سُبْحَانَهُ ۖ هُوَ اللَّهُ الْوَاحِدُ الْقَهَّارُ
39.translation: If Allah had intended to take a son, He could have chosen from what He creates whatever He willed. Exalted is He; He is Allah, the One, the Prevailing.
39.transliteration: Law araadal laahu aiyattakhiza waladal lastafaa mimmaa yakhluqu maa yashaaa'; Subhaanahoo Huwal laahul Waahidul Qahhaar

39.text: خَلَقَ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضَ بِالْحَقِّ ۖ يُكَوِّرُ اللَّيْلَ عَلَى النَّهَارِ وَيُكَوِّرُ النَّهَارَ عَلَى اللَّيْلِ ۖ وَسَخَّرَ الشَّمْسَ وَالْقَمَرَ ۖ كُلٌّ يَجْرِي لِأَجَلٍ مُسَمًّى ۗ أَلَا هُوَ الْعَزِيزُ الْغَفَّارُ
39.translation: He created the heavens and earth in truth. He wraps the night over the day and wraps the day over the night and has subjected the sun and the moon, each running [its course] for a specified term. Unquestionably, He is the Exalted in Might, the Perpetual Forgiver.
39.transliteration: Khalaqas samaawaati wal arda bilhaqq; yukawwirul laila 'alan nahaari wa yukawwirun nahaara 'alaal laili wa sakhkharash shamsa walqamara kulluny yajree li ajalim musammaa; alaa Huwal 'Azeezul Ghaffaar

39.text: خَلَقَكُمْ مِنْ نَفْسٍ وَاحِدَةٍ ثُمَّ جَعَلَ مِنْهَا زَوْجَهَا وَأَنْزَلَ لَكُمْ مِنَ الْأَنْعَامِ ثَمَانِيَةَ أَزْوَاجٍ ۚ يَخْلُقُكُمْ فِي بُطُونِ أُمَّهَاتِكُمْ خَلْقًا مِنْ بَعْدِ خَلْقٍ فِي ظُلُمَاتٍ ثَلَاثٍ ۚ ذَٰلِكُمُ اللَّهُ رَبُّكُمْ لَهُ الْمُلْكُ ۖ لَا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۖ فَأَنَّىٰ تُصْرَفُونَ
39.translation: He created you from one soul. Then He made from it its mate, and He produced for you from the grazing livestock eight mates. He creates you in the wombs of your mothers, creation after creation, within three darknesses. That is Allah, your Lord; to Him belongs dominion. There is no deity except Him, so how are you averted?
39.transliteration: Khalaqakum min nafsinw waahidatin summa ja'ala minhaa zawjahaa wa anzala lakum minal-an'aami samaani yata azwaaj; yakhuluqukum fee butooni ummahaatikum khalqam mim ba'di khalqin fee zulumaatin salaas; zaalikumul laahu Rabbukum lahul mulk; laaa ilaaha illaa Huwa fa annaa tusrafoon

39.text: إِنْ تَكْفُرُوا فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ غَنِيٌّ عَنْكُمْ ۖ وَلَا يَرْضَىٰ لِعِبَادِهِ الْكُفْرَ ۖ وَإِنْ تَشْكُرُوا يَرْضَهُ لَكُمْ ۗ وَلَا تَزِرُ وَازِرَةٌ وِزْرَ أُخْرَىٰ ۗ ثُمَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكُمْ مَرْجِعُكُمْ فَيُنَبِّئُكُمْ بِمَا كُنْتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ ۚ إِنَّهُ عَلِيمٌ بِذَاتِ الصُّدُورِ
39.translation: If you disbelieve - indeed, Allah is Free from need of you. And He does not approve for His servants disbelief. And if you are grateful, He approves it for you; and no bearer of burdens will bear the burden of another. Then to your Lord is your return, and He will inform you about what you used to do. Indeed, He is Knowing of that within the breasts.
39.transliteration: In takfuroo fa innal laaha ghaniyyun 'ankum; wa laa yardaa li'ibaadihil kufra wa in tashkuroo yardahu lakum; wa laa taziru waaziratunw wizra ukhraa; summa ilaa Rabikum marji'ukum fa-yunabbi'ukum bimaa kuntum ta'maloon; innahoo 'aleemum bizaatissudoor

39.text: ۞ وَإِذَا مَسَّ الْإِنْسَانَ ضُرٌّ دَعَا رَبَّهُ مُنِيبًا إِلَيْهِ ثُمَّ إِذَا خَوَّلَهُ نِعْمَةً مِنْهُ نَسِيَ مَا كَانَ يَدْعُو إِلَيْهِ مِنْ قَبْلُ وَجَعَلَ لِلَّهِ أَنْدَادًا لِيُضِلَّ عَنْ سَبِيلِهِ ۚ قُلْ تَمَتَّعْ بِكُفْرِكَ قَلِيلًا ۖ إِنَّكَ مِنْ أَصْحَابِ النَّارِ
39.translation: And when adversity touches man, he calls upon his Lord, turning to Him [alone]; then when He bestows on him a favor from Himself, he forgets Him whom he called upon before, and he attributes to Allah equals to mislead [people] from His way. Say, "Enjoy your disbelief for a little; indeed, you are of the companions of the Fire."
39.transliteration: Wa izaa massal insaana durrun da'aa Rabbahoo muneeban ilaihi summa izaa khawwalahoo ni'matam minhu nasiya maa kaana yad'ooo ilaihi min qablu wa ja'ala lillaahi andaadal liyudilla 'ansabeelih; qul tamatta' bikufrika qaleelan innaka min Ashaabin Naar;

39.text: أَمَّنْ هُوَ قَانِتٌ آنَاءَ اللَّيْلِ سَاجِدًا وَقَائِمًا يَحْذَرُ الْآخِرَةَ وَيَرْجُو رَحْمَةَ رَبِّهِ ۗ قُلْ هَلْ يَسْتَوِي الَّذِينَ يَعْلَمُونَ وَالَّذِينَ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ ۗ إِنَّمَا يَتَذَكَّرُ أُولُو الْأَلْبَابِ
39.translation: Is one who is devoutly obedient during periods of the night, prostrating and standing [in prayer], fearing the Hereafter and hoping for the mercy of his Lord, [like one who does not]? Say, "Are those who know equal to those who do not know?" Only they will remember [who are] people of understanding.
39.transliteration: Amman huwa qaanitun aanaaa'al laili saajidanw wa qaaa'imai yahzarul Aakhirata wa yarjoo rahmata Rabbih; qul hal yastawil lazeena ya'lamoona wallazeena laa ya'lamoon; innamaa yatazakkaru ulul albaab

39.text: قُلْ يَا عِبَادِ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا اتَّقُوا رَبَّكُمْ ۚ لِلَّذِينَ أَحْسَنُوا فِي هَٰذِهِ الدُّنْيَا حَسَنَةٌ ۗ وَأَرْضُ اللَّهِ وَاسِعَةٌ ۗ إِنَّمَا يُوَفَّى الصَّابِرُونَ أَجْرَهُمْ بِغَيْرِ حِسَابٍ
39.translation: Say, "O My servants who have believed, fear your Lord. For those who do good in this world is good, and the earth of Allah is spacious. Indeed, the patient will be given their reward without account."
39.transliteration: Qul yaa 'ibaadil lazeena aamanut taqoo Rabbakum; lillazeena ahsanoo fee haazihid dunyaa hasanah; wa ardul laahi waasi'ah; innamaa yuwaffas saabiroona ajrahum bighayri hisab

39.text: قُلْ إِنِّي أُمِرْتُ أَنْ أَعْبُدَ اللَّهَ مُخْلِصًا لَهُ الدِّينَ
39.translation: Say, [O Muhammad], "Indeed, I have been commanded to worship Allah, [being] sincere to Him in religion.
39.transliteration: Qul inneee umirtu an a'budal laaha mukhlisal lahud deen

39.text: وَأُمِرْتُ لِأَنْ أَكُونَ أَوَّلَ الْمُسْلِمِينَ
39.translation: And I have been commanded to be the first [among you] of the Muslims."
39.transliteration: Wa umirtu li an akoona awwalal muslimeen

39.text: قُلْ إِنِّي أَخَافُ إِنْ عَصَيْتُ رَبِّي عَذَابَ يَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍ
39.translation: Say, "Indeed I fear, if I should disobey my Lord, the punishment of a tremendous Day."
39.transliteration: Qul inneee akhaafu in 'asaitu Rabbee 'azaaba Yawmin 'azeem

39.text: قُلِ اللَّهَ أَعْبُدُ مُخْلِصًا لَهُ دِينِي
39.translation: Say, "Allah [alone] do I worship, sincere to Him in my religion,
39.transliteration: Qulil laaha a'budu mukhlisal lahoo deenee

39.text: فَاعْبُدُوا مَا شِئْتُمْ مِنْ دُونِهِ ۗ قُلْ إِنَّ الْخَاسِرِينَ الَّذِينَ خَسِرُوا أَنْفُسَهُمْ وَأَهْلِيهِمْ يَوْمَ الْقِيَامَةِ ۗ أَلَا ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ الْخُسْرَانُ الْمُبِينُ
39.translation: So worship what you will besides Him." Say, "Indeed, the losers are the ones who will lose themselves and their families on the Day of Resurrection. Unquestionably, that is the manifest loss."
39.transliteration: Fa'budoo maa shi'tum min doonih; qul innal khaasireenal lazeena khasirooo anfusahum wa ahleehim yawmal qiyaamah; alaa zaalika huwal khusraanul mubeen
